· KO Legends

name: Game Doraemon: Nobita no Shin Kyouryuu
summary:
The story about Nobita meeting with the twin dinosaurs Kyu and Myu, he decided to raise it and become a loving parent despite being different. But in the end, there is a limit where Kyu and Myu could live in modern times.

Nobita with Doraemon and friends decided to travel in the past 66 million years ago and began to find Kyu and Myu friends.

With the help of Doraemon's tools, they arrived at the Cretaceous period which is said the extinction of the dinosaurs is waiting for Kyu and Myu and the fate of Nobita and others.

name: Gag
summary:
Gag is an interactive, dialogue-based psychological horror drama following the adventures of New York comedian Andy Barr and friends.

Contains references to sexual abuse.

The Steam edition also includes downloads for the previously-released short-form games Box, Crash, and Flue.

name: Gacha Club
summary:
What club will you join? Get the party started and create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! Choose from thousands of dresses, shirts, hairstyles, weapons, and much more! After designing your characters, enter the Studio and create any scene you can imagine! Add pets, objects, and choose your favorite background! Customization is 100% free, there are no in-app purchases!

Ready for more action? Gacha over 180 units to use in battle! Choose from four different modes, including Story mode, Tower mode, and more! Collect gems, gold, and materials to enhance, awaken, and increase your skill levels! You can also play your favorite mini-games and collect gems and bytes to Gacha for more units! What are you waiting for? Step into Gacha Club and begin your adventure today!

name: Game.exe
summary: Game.exe is a Rage/Horror game inspired by the official creepy pasta.

name: Game Title: Lost Levels
summary: A sequel to Michael Brough's previous dungeon crawler, Game Title, inspired by a bug from its predecessor.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the Pacific: Admiral's Edition
Galaxian
summary: Third game released for the Epoch Cassette Vision. Despite sharing a name with the seminal Namco release, it is not based on that game but plays rather similar to Nihon Bussan's Moon Cresta.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East 2
summary: War in the East 2 is the most comprehensive, most realistic, and most advanced wargame modeling Eastern Front warfare in World War.

name: Gamerbots: Third-Robot Shooting
summary: An exciting LIVE third-person shooter where you can: Stick your Gamer Picture on Gamerbot; Customize your Gamerbot with 15 heads and unlimited color combinations; Fight with 6 basic weapons and 10 levels of upgrade in 4 criteria; Compete with worldwide players on LIVE; Challenge to 24 single player missions; Get promoted to 7 Gamerbot classes; Fight with random enemies in 6 scenes.

name: GangV: Battle Royale
summary:
GangV is an online Battle Royale game in a living environnement with policemen and civilians.
It is possible to steal cars, mug people in the street and fight with the police during a Battle Royale and in the Open World mode.
Players can control territory to earn money and the help of gangsters.
It can be played both in Virtual Reality and in non-VR.

name: Gakuen Club: Houkago no Himitsu
summary:
Adds a couple of extra scenes per character, some new CGs, voice touch in the CG gallery and new op/ed songs.

Gakuen Club is a school life love story that begins when you discover a secret at your academy, setting off a chain of events that you never imagined. Enjoy the different distinct and unique characters along with their own stories and wonderful voices.

name: Gallantry
summary: Relive the Medieval Tournament as you compete across Europe in order to be crowned the Grand Champion and fulfil your Father's legacy.

name: Game Director Story
summary: Game Director Story is an unflinching and satirical look behind-the-scenes at how big-budget AAA games are made. Based on first-hand accounts by industry veterans, Players experience the emotional roller coaster of guiding a team through the agonizing decisions and compromises needed to ship a game.

name: Gamlet
summary: An interactive fiction interpretation of the Hamlet story, blended with Jewish culture and mysticism.

name: Gamejam Gamejam
summary: A bitsy game made by Pedro Paliva for the 2019 Anti-Fascist Game Jam, hosted by Game Curious Montréal.

name: GardenLand Tycoon
summary: A time management game with agriculture theme.

name: Game & Watch: Super Mario Bros.
summary:
Game & Watch: Super Mario Bros. is a special Game & Watch released for the Super Mario Bros. 35th anniversary. It includes Super Mario Bros., Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels, a special version of the Game & Watch game Ball and a clock based on Super Mario Bros.
It was the first Game & Watch game released after Mario the Juggler (released in 1991) and the first game in the new line of Game & Watch handhelds called Color Screen.

name: Game Builder Garage
summary: Turn gaming time into learning time with the Game Builder Garage software. Kids can learn how to make their own games with guided lessons created by Nintendo. From a simple game of tag to a run-and-jump obstacle course, each lesson is broken down into multiple, manageable segments that let kids go at their own pace—and have fun in the process. Learn the basics of visual game programming By playing through interactive lessons, kids will learn the basics of visual game programming. Nodon, colorful creatures with distinct personalities, keep kids engaged through lessons with tips and motivating messages. With a simple press of a button, swap between the programming screen and the game screen—watch how programming changes the game on the fly. Track progress and build confidence After completing each lesson and building a game, kids will test their knowledge by completing Checkpoints—small puzzles or tasks to solve with programming. Master these skills and head to Free Programming mode to let your imagination (and programming chops) run wild. The Nodon you meet each have distinct personalities that complement their functions. Have fun connecting them together to see how they interact and bring your game to life. The in-game Nodopedia lets you quickly check what each Nodon does as you create. There’s also a guide that recaps important skills! Easily swap between the Programming and Game screens to see the hard-working Nodon in action. Take advantage of the Nintendo Switch system’s many features. Instead of the control stick, program motion controls to control your game. Want to create…

name: Galactic Trooper Armada
summary: All times classic space shooting game comes back in this modernized top-of-the-art 3D version. Get back into 80's with this retro troops defending game. Enjoy the enhanced version with today device capabilities and revive the gameplay simple yet addictive of first generation video-games. You mission is to defend an armada of galactic troopers through different hostile planets. Avoid turrets riffles, space and terrestrial mines, shoot down aliens using your missiles, rockets and machine guns and save lives of your soldiers. Served by beautifull graphics and sounds, this game will bring you hours of intense gameplay. Your troops need you Captain

name: Galerians: Limited Edition
summary: Galerians: Limited Edition is a special edition that contains a special outer box, a visual Book, a sticker and a memory card case. It was released only in Japan.

name: Game Dev Masters
summary: It's time to become the Game Developer you always wanted to be. Make use of a large array of features, and player skills to create stunning 10 / 10 games. Compete with and eventually acquire other dynamic Ai Studio's. Raise the talent of your team and studio's in an effort to dominate the market.

name: Gallic Wars: Battle Simulator
summary: Gallic Wars is a Roguelike tactical strategy game. Fast gameplay, crazy rag-doll physics and challenging rouge-like approach to strategy. Fight your way through roman legions. DEPLOY your troops, PLAN their movement, use magic and items to give yourself an edge, and WIN. Features: - One of a kind approach to the strategy genre - Cartoony style - a true eye candy! - Fast gameplay - Powerful magic and mighty generals - Ragdoll physics - everyone likes ragdoll physics! - Easy to play, hard to master!

name: Gangsta Paradise
summary: Your city was safe from crimes for a long time. But these times had to end. A mafia boss Al Calzone came with his thugs and wants local business owners to pay tribute for "protection". Some people started to pay cash, some paid with theirs lives. It was only a matter of time when they will visit your mothers' flowers store. You can't wait, time to get rid of these mobsters and show who is the real boss here.

name: Gamitate the Meditation Game
summary: Gamitate is a like a gym for your mind and soul. "Work Out" your mind with carefully selected meditation techniques! Gamitate is designed to make you feel calmer, happier, and more peaceful. Enjoy the benefits of a wide variety of easy meditation techniques.

name: Games for Toddlers 2
summary: Each game is simple and uses only the touch screen. Egg Shakers: A simple and engaging rhythmic game. Pet Sitter: A simplified pet simulator featuring a cute cat. Kids Xylophone: The children's version of the iconic musical instrument. Wooden Blocks: The video game version of classic wooden stacking blocks.

name: Gas Station: Highway Services
summary: Buckle up and get ready for the trip of your life! When you cruise on an open highway, the safety and convenience of your trip depend on the services provided along the road. This is a game that lets you explore them!

name: Galtia V Edition
summary:
It was a world supported by the "Kings". Humans divided by the characteristics of the four large "Galtia Abilities". Four of these abilities were crowned the "Kings" of four countries.

A greatly individualistic society and culturally constructed and developed under the protection of the kings. But slowly, the shadow of decay was creeping in. In response to the drying of the earth, each country had their own expectations. The "king" and the course of the world was....

A tale of war, intrigue, love, and hate set in the four countries on the continent of Alderant. The protagonist Shin works as a freelancing jack-of-all-trades doing various different jobs. After getting caught up in an assassination attempt on one of the kings present at the Meeting of The Four Countries, he ends up drawing close to the mysteries of this world.

name: Gander National Park
summary: Get lost in the vast wilderness of Gander National Park. In this hiking simulator you can explore and unravel the park's mysteries, or just enjoy a relaxing hike. Make friends and help other hikers while earning karma points to determine your hike's ending.

name: Game of Puzzles: Dinosaurs
summary: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Gates of Mirnah
summary: Gates of Mirnah is an upcoming story-driven sci-fi action adventure game. The energy-based combat system of Gates of Mirnah guarantees fun, action and variety.

name: Gazmatera: Return of the Generals
summary: In the years between 1988 and 1994, somewhere in Europe a squadron of the best fighters from crime, called "generals", was blacklisted for liquidation. Take control of four survivors, Jeff, Kayla, Helga and Emilia, and exterminate the leader of the enemy gang!

name: Gangster War
summary: Help cool John avenge the betrayal, destroy the enemies and regain power over the city! Shoot the gangsters, shoot the gangsters, throw grenades into the crowd and drop bombs!

name: Gaelco Arcade 1
summary:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Gaelco Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Alligator Hunt
- Biomechanical Toy
- Glass
- Snow Board Championship
- Thunder Hoop
- World Rally

name: Garden Magic
summary: A short match 3 game with unique mechanics.

name: Games and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy!

name: GalaxySpace VR
summary: Galaxy Space VR is a third-person VR shooting game. Avoid enemy attacks and shoot down enemies on all stages!

name: Garena Free Fire Max
summary: Free Fire Max is designed exclusively to deliver premium gameplay experience in a Battle Royale. Enjoy a variety of exciting game modes with all Free Fire players via exclusive Firelink technology. Experience combat like never before with Ultra HD resolutions and breathtaking effects. Ambush, snipe, and survive; There is only one goal: to survive and be the last one standing.

name: Gaia Project
summary: Gaia Project is the digital adaptation of the boardgame Gaia Project created by Helge Ostertag and Jens Drögemüller and published by "Feuerland Verlag". It is a 1-4 player strategy game. It plays in the same universe as Terra Mystica and continues the adventure in the far future.

name: Galaxy Crisis
summary: In 2070 AD, the galaxy was invaded by alien civilization, and humans must fight desperately!

name: Gangster Simulator
summary: Have you ever admired the characters from gangster movies? But not the good ones… Now you can play as a real gangster without any consequences.

name: Gang Wars
summary: Gang Wars - shoot faster, live longer!

name: Galactic Solo Command
summary: In Galactic Solo Command you experience the atmosphere of running a spaceship while trying to return home after the crew has mysteriously disappeared. It's a very dangerous trip, with every jump presenting a challenge with life or death decisions. Prepare your ship!

name: Gangster Empire: Vendetta
summary: Ever secretly wanted to run your own Mafia organization, playing the role of a ruthless mob leader? Now you can with Gangster Empire: Vendetta!

name: Galactic Speed Legends
summary: Buy a craft or build a new one from the scratch, bet it, repair it, upgrade it, push it to the limit and take high-speed turns like never before. Prepare yourself to challenge elite drivers in the galaxy through a series of championships, and personal head to head races.

name: Gate to Site 8
summary: Gate to Site 8 is a short, dark story-driven game about the traumatic childhood of two brothers. You venture back home and try to remember the fragmented memories of your past.

name: Galactic Crew II
summary: Galactic Crew II is a roguelike space exploration game inspired by FTL and the classic XCOM games. Explore a hostile galaxy with your valorous crew from its center to the outer reaches of space, clawing your way up from a nobody to a galactic pioneer through colonization, commerce, and combat.

name: Garden City
summary: Garden City – an exciting strategy game set in park landscapes.

name: Game of Drones
summary: Football and drones collide in GAME OF DRONES. It is a minimalist mini multiplayer game with a reduced, futuristic look.

name: Gaia 2: Ancient Mysteries
summary: A sci-fi base building survival open world game, featuring raids, natural disasters, agriculture and more.

name: Garage: Bad Dream Adventure
summary: In this remastered version of Garage: Bad Dream Adventure, almost all images have been retouched, videos have been revised using AI frame interpolation, user-interface and game balance have been improved, and new chapters, subquests and multiple endings have been added.

name: Games 4
summary:
A compilation of 6 games for a ZX81 with a 16K memory expansion module.

Lunar Landing
The lunar excursion module starts in a atable lunar orbit. You can control it to bring it a soft landing on the moon.

Twenty One
The card game of Twenty One

Combat
You are in a spacecraft equiped with 12 missiles with which you have to fight of aliens.

Substrike
Within a grid you have to fight of submarines using depth charges.

Codebreaker
A Mastermind like game

Mayday
You have to find a person lost in space (7x7x7 grid).

name: Galaxy Warrior
summary:
A top down view space battle against the Klingons. You can rotate your ship and fire rockets to the Klingons but make sure not to hit them.

After defeating all the Klingons you can use a wormhole to go the the next galaxy.

You can configure the speed and whether the Klingons move or not and you have three ships at your disposal.

name: Gangstar: Miami Vindication
summary: Gangstar: Miami Vindication is an open-world action-adventure video game

name: Game & Watch: The Legend of Zelda
summary: With a retro look, legendary flourishes, and the power to save Hyrule, the Game & Watch: The Legend of Zelda system is a jam-packed tribute to 35 years of the Legend of Zelda series. Adventure through three iconic classics and enjoy all-new old-school fun with this stylish handheld system.

name: Game.exe
summary: You bought a PC that belonged to a suicidal developer, do you dare to run "Game.exe"?

name: Garfield Labyrinth
summary: Garfield Labyrinth is the European port of Mickey Mouse IV: Mahou no Labyrinth (known in North America as The Real Ghostbusters). The game is the fifth game in the Crazy Castle series.

name: Game Dev Company
summary: Game Dev Company is a simulation of game dev company, where you can build company, add furniture,build develop department ,Develop your own games to make money and make your company the most famous game company.

name: Game For Anna
summary: Hello Anna. I made a game for you. We can play together as we used to.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East: Don to the Danube
summary: This expansion comes with a wide array of later war scenarios ranging from short but intense 6 turn bouts like the Battle for Kharkov (1942) to immense 37-turn engagements taking place across multiple nations like Drama on the Danube (Summer 1944 – Spring 1945).

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the West: Operation Torch
summary: Operation Torch is an expansion of the acclaimed wargame, Gary Grigsby’s War in the West. This new addition to the most detailed strategy game available on the Western Front of WWII, introduces 10 new challenging scenarios, including both historical and what-if operations.

name: Galactic Civilizations II: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Originally released on 2006-2-21, Galactic Civilizations II (GalCiv II) is a 4X Grand strategy game set in the 23rd century, when multiple alien civilizations scramble to conquer the galaxy, planet by planet, by force, diplomacy, influence (culture), or technology. GalCiv II focuses on the single player experience that consists of a Campaign mode and a "Sandbox" mode, and omits multi-player. The game is notable for its artificial intelligence, which is challenging without being given resources and abilities not available to the player, as is common in the majority of strategy games.

Galactic Civilizations II: Dark Avatar is the first expansion pack to the turn-based strategy game Galactic Civilizations II: Dread Lords. It added new features such as: Two new civilizations: a genocidal Drengin offshoot called the Korath and a civilization called the Krynn, A new campaign in which the player leads the Drengin Empire, The ability to create custom opponents, An "environment" statistic to planets, which will determine which civilization can innately colonize or what technologies will be necessary for other civilizations to colonize different planets, An enhanced role for espionage, special "Agents" being hired that can conduct various missions, such as sabotage or destabilization, on rival worlds, or act as counter-agents against rival agents attempting to conduct missions on the player's worlds, Asteroid fields to the space map, for players to mine for resources. Resources from asteroid fields are directed to planets where they increase manufacturing capacity, A great deal of new ship hulls and jewellery and The extermination of two civilizations during the campaign - the two exterminated civilizations will still be available in "sandbox" mode, but will not appear in the future releases of the game.

Galactic Civilizations II: Twilight of the Arnor is the second expansion pack to the turn-based strategy video game Galactic Civilizations II: Dread Lords. It added new features such as: The ability to destroy solar systems with massive ships called "Terror Stars", Unique technology trees, planetary improvements, and weapons for each civilization, A map pointer and custom scenario editor, New graphics that reduce graphic memory requirements by over 90% and a new map size that allows for games that may take millennia to complete

The officially supported Community Update, included in all recent releases of Ultimate Edition, fixes severe bugs in the AI that were present in Twilight of the Arnor.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Worlds in Crisis
summary: In Worlds in Crisis, you will encounter a host of new world events with ideological choices that you will have to resolve. Several new planet types and well over a dozen new planet features also await you.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Revenge of the Snathi
summary: The Snathi have risen from the ashes of their Precursor prison world. Lead this evil new empire of bloodthirsty squirrels to galactic domination in sandbox and their own campaign.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Altarian Prophecy
summary: Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance in its first encounter with the Altarian Confederation. Adds two new factions, a 3 mission campaign scenario and more.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Heroes of Star Control - Origins
summary: The Tywom, Mu'Kay, Mowlings and other unique alien species from the Star Control: Origins universe have come to Galactic Civilizations III! Each alien race includes a unique leader, ship designs, traits, music, and more.

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Clarice
summary: Clarice, the heroine of Jaleco's City Connection/Cruisin, flies (drives?) into action with this DLC. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Gateball VR
summary: Realize outdoor gateball sports in VR! 4 stages of realistic outdoor scenes (park day / night, beach day / night) Play from 1 to 5 players on a single device

name: Garrison: A Mercenary's Story
summary: Garrison is a Mercenary, who is trying to find new hope after getting chased out of his born and raised country on another land.

name: Gaggle Brains!
summary: Gaggle Brains! is a short puzzle game with 16 levels and simple controls. Steer your crowd of procedurally animated, physics driven humans, past multiple hordes of zombies - try to get as many past the finish line as possible.

name: Gangsta Magic
summary: Gangsta magician need solve puzzles, avoid traps and enemies and find mystery USA Cone in his adventure

name: Galmon Folklore: Monster Girl Galore!
summary: A super kawaii and lengthy fantasy RPG with over 200 girl monsters!

name: Galaxy in Peril: Time Trouble
summary: The galaxy is in peril again. Falias forces have made it back to your galaxy, and want to harvest the energy from your star! The only way to stop them is to go back in time using a newly discovered blackhole. Go back in time, disable the devices, and save your galaxy!

name: GAI Stops Auto: Right Version Simulator
summary: Become the lord of this road! Put things in order in the traffic! Write out fines for violators and do not fall into the gachi trap...

name: Gachi Dungeon Master
summary: Take on the role of one of the five legendary gachimuchi icons and enter the arena. Each character is distinguished by their own grips and strikes. Someone falls with his ass right on the face of the opponent, and someone gracefully wringes the opponent's hands.

name: Galia Senki: Yuuhen Annales
summary: This is a strategy game taking place during the Gallic War.

name: Gachi Revenge
summary: The adventure of our beloved hero, in which he has to overcome all the obstacles prepared by the Gachi gang. They stole the most valuable and now pay for it.

name: Gamemory
summary: Improve memory of kids under 5 years old with Augmented Reality. This game is for 2 people — one of the parents and little wunderkind. The adult opens every square and lets the kid remember it. After that, closes and asks the kid what kind of thing under the exact square. Well, in the end, open together to check.

name: Gachimuchi Life Simulator
summary: Experience the whole journey of becoming a Gachimuchi fighter. Deep RPG system, open world. Become the best in the Gacimuchi league!

name: Gaps by Powgi
summary: These words have one letter missing. Deduce the correct letters to fill the gaps and spell a new word, but watch out for red herrings! There are 150 puzzles to solve - and 150 terrible jokes.

name: Gachi Run: Running of the Slaves
summary: Furious 3D runner about a pumped-up Gachi. Run as far as possible! Collect Sweets! Set new records and enjoy a great soundtrack.

name: Galactic Pick Up Artist
summary: A dating-sim that augments your real life dating skills! Become the commander of a small science vessel, and meet the girls aboard your ship, all while training real life social skills. Can it get any better? Oh yes, it can. There’s Nudity (obviously).

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Ultimate Edition
summary: The Galactic Civilizations III Ultimate Edition includes Galactic Civilizations III plus all of its DLCs and expansions. Choose from dozens of unique races and make a name for yourself across the galaxy!

name: Galaxy X
summary: Embark on an epic journey in this hardcore Multiplayer RPG! As a Galactic Cadet, you and your Combat Squad of friends must brave hostile worlds in search of valuable loot and resources. Craft powerful gear, slay otherworldly creatures, and save the galaxy.

name: Galaxy Guardian Royale
summary: This game takes place in space, its classical Battle Royale mode. 50 players joining battle around solar system. Last player wins.

name: Gardens and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Gan's Matchstick Men: Deadly Rhythm
summary: Matchstick Men: Deadly rhythm is a local multiplayer fighting game. Use strange mechanics to blow your opponents.(Temporary multiplayer is not supported)

name: Gamer Girls 2
summary: This is a casual block game. There are 10 different scenes with little stories. You can move figures to pass the level and you will unlock the girl’s stories and dynamic CGs.

name: Game about games
summary: GAG is a new way to talk about games. Episode No. 1: Dying Light and freedom.

name: Game of Love
summary: Alice thought high school would just be an easy ride. But when she suddenly becomes very popular, the drama begins. Threats first. It always starts with threats... but what comes next?

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Rise of the Terrans DLC
summary: Lead the United Earth faction against the deadly Xendar menace in a new prequel story campaign.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Lost Treasures DLC
summary: Uncover lost treasures of the past, discover ancient technologies, and guide your empire into a new age of prosperity. Lost Treasures adds new colony events, planetary improvements, ship components and more.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Map Pack DLC
summary: Create your own universes with the Map Pack's new Editor. The Map Pack also includes 8 challenging new maps for players to conquer that range in size from gigantic 18 player areas to intimate maps perfectly sized for two-player duels.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Revenge of the Snathi DLC
summary: The Snathi have risen from the ashes of their Precursor prison world. Lead this evil new empire of bloodthirsty squirrels to galactic domination in sandbox and their own campaign.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Mega Events DLC
summary: Shake up your gameplay with new galaxy-wide Mega Events! These new events introduce additional complexity requiring your skill and strategy to overcome if you hope to be victorious.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Mercenaries Expansion Pack
summary: Play through a new campaign, hire unique mercenaries to your cause, and play with two new factions in this first expansion pack for Galactic Civilizations III.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Retribution Expansion
summary: What started as a crusade has become a war of retribution. Your civilization has uncovered powerful artifacts, discovered how to construct hypergates, encountered two new major civilizations, and much more in this exciting expansion to the award-winning space 4X game.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Precursor Worlds DLC
summary: Unlock the mysteries of the Precursors and explore long forgotten ancient worlds. Discover several new types of planets, deal with unexpected new colony events, and solve the riddles of perplexing anomalies.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Worlds in Crisis DLC
summary: In Worlds in Crisis, you will encounter a host of new world events with ideological choices that you will have to resolve. Several new planet types and well over a dozen new planet features also await you, providing excitement for old-time Galactic Civilizations players new and old.

name: Galactic Civilizations III: Villains of Star Control - Origins
summary: The Scryve, Phamysht, Xraki, and the Measured from the Star Control: Origins universe have come to Galactic Civilizations III! Each alien race includes a unique leader, ship designs, traits, music, and more.

name: Game of Puzzles: Slavic Mythology
summary: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Game of Puzzles: Animals
summary: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Game of Puzzles: Animals - Expansion Pack
summary: 25 new levels for the game Game Of Puzzles: Animals.

name: Garage Ninja
summary: A Turn-Based RPG following Garage Ninja as he seeks to overthrow the Evil Kathleen Kennedy and restore his clan. Meet zany Fully Voiced Characters and explore an expansive original world. With over 3 Quests, more than 5 skills, and 30 different genres, Garage Ninja has something for everyone.

name: Garetto
summary: Garetto - is a physics-based casual game in which you control a green sphere and move forward. You need to collect diamonds for which you get points and avoid collisions with different figures that appear on your way. And how many points can you get?

name: Gabriel's Worlds: The Adventure
summary: Help Gabriel find out what happened to his friends, explore levels with a high degree of difficulty, puzzles, collectibles and a beautiful story, in a precision platform game focused on exploration.

name: Galaxy Drift
summary: Galaxy Drift is a high speed isometric racer inspired by classics like F-Zero, Rock n' Roll Racing and RC Pro-Am. Reach astronomical speeds, def the laws of physics as you warp past planets, stars and black holes in an adrenaline fueled race across the galaxy!

name: Gay Harem
summary: Collect sexy men to build your harem and complete quests in this browser game built around resource management. Explicit scenes; adults only.

name: GameGuru: Industrial Sewer Pack
summary: A comprehensive asset pack with over 200 items for creating indoor and outdoor sewer based game levels.

name: Galactic Refugees
summary: A beginner-friendly old-school shmup meets bullet hell

name: Galaxy Arena
summary: Immerse yourself in a virtual reality world with Captain Gordon and battle alien invaders

name: Galaxy Kart
summary: Gear up, strap in, and prepare for the ultimate VR racing experience with Galaxy Kart VR. Whether you're a seasoned racer or a newcomer to the genre, get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the cosmos where victory awaits at every turn!

name: Game Tengoku: Cruisin Mix Special - Gokuraku Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Game Tengoku Cruisin Mix Special
- Special Box drawn artwork by Mr. Kenichi Sonoda
- DLC: Tatsujin PS4
- DLC: Playable character Homura Bantou from Moero!! Pro Yakyuu
- Newly-recorded Genius Yamada voice drama CD
- Digital version of player character compilation voice drama CD
- Arranged background music soundtrack
- Original video animation reprint
- Drama CD Script

name: Galaxy Highways

You destroy enemy ships, space stations, mother ships or bosses and complete all missions as soon as possible before enemy defense system destroys you with its powerful waves of attacks.

name: Gang of Paws

name: Gangs of Rikton
summary: Welcome to Rikton City! Can't find work you say? Be creative! Considering the number of gangs in this city, there must be a lot of opportunities. Even if it's morally questionable...

name: Gate
summary: Gate is a text-based furry homo romance game developed by NVL maker, in which the player will play the role of the protagonist to "break the system" as an opportunity to establish a relationship with the furries and find a way to achieve peace between races.

name: Galactigun
summary: Galactigun is a music rhythm space shooter designed for touch screen devices. Travel through the synthwave torrent, destroying enemy ships to the beat. Use precise timing to accelerate your score and rank.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV
summary: As the all-powerful leader of a spacefaring civilization, you must seek out new star systems and discover the exciting potential of the subspace realm. There are thousands of worlds to colonize and dozens of civilizations - both old and new - to encounter.

name: Game of Mafia
summary: Game Of Mafia is an adventure game set in New York City in the mid-1920s. You play as Frank, an ordinary postman whose quiet life changes dramatically when he meets his old friend. Opening your own bar sounds much better than delivering packages for the rest of life.

name: Galvatia
summary: Galvatia is a PC game where you are an invisible conservationist for animals. It contains 5-enviroments such as a European meadow, a mixed forest, an American rainforest, an African savannah and an ocean.

name: Galaxy's Extreme
summary: Frenetic spaceship racing game, inspired by the high speed racing games of the 90s.

name: Gate
summary: Gate is an action-adventure game for the Macintosh. It blends action, adventure, and brain-teasing challenges into an addictive fast-action game with smooth animation, exciting music and sound effects. Escape the castle's prison, battle enemies, solve puzzles, and defeat your captor to restore peace to the land.

name: Garrison
summary: Traverse a broken empire to help the people and learn the truth. Discover items and combine them in new ways to destroy obstacles or enemies as you explore both side-scrolling and top-down perspective areas. Set out on an action/adventure journey.

name: Galaxy Reavers: Titan
summary:
A paid DLC for “Galaxy Reavers”, allowing commanders to unlock the giant warship “Titan” and build up a more diverse and powerful fleet to challenge higher level stages!

To allow commanders build up a more diverse and powerful fleet, this DLC will release a special giant warship–the Titan!

Content
1.Unlocks a giant warship, “Titan”.
2.Unlocks a device, “Torpedo IV”.
3.Gains 200 Khorium.

Titan is a giant warship in “Galaxy Reavers”. Like a great castle, it possesses great defense as well as highest CPU value in game. Along with its most enormous space for devices, the full power Titian is nightmare to the enemy fleet!

In addition, there is 200 Gold in this DLC as well, allowing commanders to purchase more powerful warships and devices!

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Frenzy
summary: In Full Metal Frenzy the racing mayhem that is Gas Guzzlers Extreme continues with new maps, new cars and new power-ups not to be missed!

name: Gas Guzzlers Extreme: Full Metal Zombie
summary: A Zombie apocalypse has taken over the hi-octane GAS GUZZLERS EXTREME universe ! Normally this would be bad news for humanity, but not for you ! Armed to the teeth in your rig, and with insane power-ups littering each arena, you should be more than capable of obliterating the hordes of the undead.

name: Game of Thrones: Beyond the Wall - Blood Bound
summary: Travel beyond the Wall, 10 years prior to the events of Game of Thrones! Plunge into the dark past of Mors Westford and delve deep into Wildling territory in a perilous mission… that same mission where Mors earned his nickname.

name: Gaslamp Cases: The Deadly Machine
summary: Morgan Johnson is one of Londons finest police detectives. Help him and his partner Jack in this brand new Macht-3 game to solve a thrilling murder case.

name: Galaxy War
summary: Galaxy War is a discrete logic arcade game released by Sega in 1978. It is a shooting game which is very similar to Bullet Mark—four types of targets, such as spacecraft and disks, are aimed at by one or two players. There is a bullet indicator and you can fire the trigger while squeezing the trigger.

name: Galagan's Island: Reprymian Rising - Metagalactic Monstrosities
summary: Play as the 5 bosses from Galagan's Island: Reprymian Rising!

name: Game-Kun: Input Challenge
summary: Game-Kun: Input Challenge is a reaction-based hiscore mini game. Test your reflexes and input skills with your gamepad. Unlock skins and other characters to enhance the fun! Can you reach the final level and compete for the ultimate hiscore?

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Homura Banto
summary: Homura Banto joins the team from Jaleco's classic baseball series: Bases Loaded. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Gamble Tower
summary: Embark on a high-stakes journey in our roguelite deckbuilder! A place where every decision is a gamble, risk and reward intertwine to shape your odds. Delve into a dark fantasy world brought to life through mesmerizing 2D hand-painted art, where wacky characters and unpredictable challenges await.

name: Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel
summary: Fight space pirates with Rapunzel, the Android with the best hair in the world! To protect the precious shelter where the Jimo race lives, the cute alien Rose and Android Rapunzel must go up to the ground floor.

name: Game Theory At Christmas
summary: In order to participate in the game competition, let's make a game with the theme of Game Theory. Originally thought so, but due to various complicated reasons. In the end it became a spoof game.

name: Gamedec: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
This bundle includes:
Gamedec digital copy
The Art of Gamedec – 80 pages of art and design concepts.
Digital Soundtrack - many minutes of the noir-themed original score.
Exclusive skin of Torkil Aymore - the protagonists known from the Gamedec books saga.

name: Gardenia
summary:
A contemplative world-building game / toy. Take your time and tweak this or that little world.

The game is available in English and Brazilian Portuguese.

name: Galak-Z: The Void / Skulls of the Shogun: Bone-A-Fide Edition - Platinum Pack
summary: GALAK-Z - The Voidis an '80s spaceship anime and arcade-gaming meld with ultra-modern physics and A.I. in a skill-demanding, procedurally generated rogue-lite adventure! Be the hero in a world that oozes classic Saturday morning anime but plays like a tough, modern, tactical shooter.

name: Game of Lust
summary: Human race is facing extinction, as a fameless bandit surviving in the last human kingdom, will you be able to use your wisdom and unlimited sexual energy to restore the dying kingdom?

name: GALSAD: Galactic Salvage and Disposal
summary: Space-based 3D flight arcade game. Blast planetary debris and mine asteroids on your way to high mission scores. Climb the leaderboard. Solo developed indie game.

name: Gazzlers
summary: Gazzlers is an insane VR shooter full of diesel-fueled chaos! Embark on an epic train ride across the lands of Ginkgo. Build your ultimate weapon and shoot, block, and dodge your way through hordes of crazy enemies to reach the Temple of the Machine God.

name: GamerZ CastlE Rush!
summary: Simple Tower Defense game in pixel graphics

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East: Lost Battles
summary: This new addition to the award-winning War in the East fills out your collection of Eastern Front scenarios with a range of new and challenging battles.

name: Galaxy Genome
summary:
Humanity is facing the threat of being totally destroyed. What hides behind the attack remains unknown. May it be aliens? Or political elites struggling for power? Or even an uprising involving AI… Still, the main question is: who will be able to solve the case?
At the beginning of the game you are a pilot of a small ship. Financial struggle forces you to start transporting contraband. Certainly, it will lead to you being in trouble with the law someday. But at some point in your life you are forced to make a deal with the authorities of the system. And that is when your dangerous space adventure begins.
In addition to the main storyline, there are many side missions the player can be engaged in. Choose your own path: do you want to become the richest merchant or the most famous pirate who holds in awe all inhabited systems of the universe? Or maybe you crave for space exploration and discovering new worlds? Now it's up to you to decide.

name: Gamebook Adventures 8: Curse of the Assassin
summary: Curse of the Assassin takes you back to the familiar surrounds of Orlandes City where you pick up your life some time after the events in An Assassin in Orlandes. You’ve risen through society after dealing with Eltane and saving the city, capturing the affections of the Duke’s daughter along the way. The mysterious death of friend arouses your suspicions and once again you find yourself at the heart of conspiracy that takes you back to your home village and a meeting with your old adventuring party from your youth. An exciting mystery adventure thriller races from Orlandes City through to the wilds of Orlandes, into the mines of Kern Badenach and even out to sea!

name: Game of Roads
summary: Settle on tiles, connect them with roads. Build up their values by connecting multiple tiles to your capitals. In Duel mode capture enemy tiles by building strength where its needed. Tiles are turned in a new order and randomized for each game. Earn achievements and make your way to the top of the world-wide leaderboards!

name: Galaxy's Edge
summary: Galaxy's Edge is a SpaceShooter game in which you are a spaceship that has to battle against aliens to save planet earth from destruction.

name: Gasp: Life on Mars
summary: Play the game on Mars, with a new visuals and effects. This is one of many new planets we will be adding to this pack.

name: Gang of Four: The Card Game
summary:
Gang of Four is an exciting game of cunning and strategy. Be the first to get rid of your cards and ascend to supreme power!
Descended from Choh Dai Di, the most infamous of backstreet Hong-Kong games, Gang of Four is the most popular card game to emerge from Asia in decades. Prepare yourself to struggle for power against the greatest gangsters of China!
Transmitting the mystery, intrigue and intense struggle for influence that embodied the Mafia world, Gang of four is filled with an endless variety of strategies. Exciting, entertaining and full of surprises, it is still simple to learn and play.
Play strong classic card combinations (Pairs, Full House, Straight Flush,...) with tactics to gain the advantage! But be careful of the Gang of Four, the greatest of all combinations! Discard all your cards before the others and snatch the victory!

name: Gamebook Adventures 10: Lords of Nurroth
summary: Nurroth, north of Orlandes City, is often viewed as an uncultured den of pirates and thieves. As a professional thief yourself, you get more than you bargain for after completing your most recent job. Clearly, you’ve stolen something you shouldn’t have. The Nurrothian Lords are on your trail, and you’re soon caught in a political tangle between Nurroth and Falavia. But a thief’s life is never meant to be easy…

name: Gamebook Adventures 9: Sultans of Rema
summary: Your return to Rema takes you further to the east, to the City-State of Callae, renowned throughout the world as a city of great learning. Your final destination is the Emirates of Akbir, ruled by a sick Emir who has remained neutral to Orlandes’ political leanings over the years. His successor threatens to send that relationship into turmoil. You must secretly enter a harsh desert world of political power struggles and strange magics to ensure a stable future for both Rema and Orlandes!

name: Galaxia Reloaded
summary:
Do you like the classics? How much money have you spent in the arcade games? Want to relive the past?
Galaxia Reloaded takes you to the past, relive your first arcade play of your life.
Your mission destroy all Galaxias, try to survive of enemy ships waves.
Be careful you can only have a missile on the screen.

name: Galaxy of Trian
summary:
Galaxy of Trian is an exciting, fast paced digital board game based on the highly acclaimed tabletop title.
Build a beautiful galaxy filled with planetary systems, nebula clouds, and ancient technology. Claim territories and defend them against your enemies. Build infrastructure and collect minerals. Score as much as possible and leave your opponents in the dust cloud!
Beat the 10-mission campaign or play online or in the hot seat.

name: Gairaldia 6
summary:
ガイラルディア6は、定番RPGのガイラルディアシリーズ第6弾で、ある兄弟の自分探しの旅から、物語は展開します!
旅のボリュームは過去のものより大きくなり、さらに謎解きもパワーアップしています!
これまで通り、特定アイテムにより、上級職へ転職可能であり、全員が上級職に就くことも可能です。
仲間同士の会話も設けられ、場合によってはそれが重要なヒントとなります。
道具コンプリート要素などのやりこみ要素もあります。

name: Gargoyle Ruins
summary: Step into the boots of a true hero in Gargoyle Ruins, the prequel to Game Stew's first title and TouchArcade's Arcade 2012 Game Of The Year--Tower of Fortune! With your companion by your side it is your hero's duty to save a wealthy kingdom where girls are kidnapped by gargoyles once a year. Solve the mystery and defeat the evil forces in this retro VFD tabletop arcade game inspired by the early Game & Watch games!

name: Galaxy Trader
summary: Galaxy Trader lets you fly trough the space. As a Trader you travel to planets and stations to buy several goods. By selling them somewhere else at a higher price you earn money. If you are successful you can buy better spaceships and build own factories.

name: Gakusen Toshi Asteriks Festa: Kirameki no Stella
GA1: An Assassin in Orlandes
summary:
An interactive fantasy adventure! It's a book. It's a game. It's an RPG. It's a Gamebook Adventure!

Set within Orlandes City, nobles are being systematically murdered by a ruthless assassin no-one seems able to catch. Finding yourself thrust in the middle of a large conspiracy, you must make decisions that may put yourself and one other most precious to you in great danger. Can you locate the Assassin in Orlandes before it is too late?

name: Game Boy Bunko: Hajimari no Mori
summary: Game Boy Bunko: Hajimari no Mori is a seemingly-never-announced port of Famicom Bunko: Hajimari no Mori which was discovered among the September 2020 lotcheck leaks.

name: Garry Royale!
summary: Epic 3RD person actrion battle royale starring everyones favorite characters from the Garry thw Wizard universe!

name: Galvanica
summary: A stupid space adventure

name: Galactic Wars EX
summary: Arcade co-op pixel perfect retro shmup

name: Galactic Empires
summary: Procedurally generated space simulation

name: Galaxystrife
summary: Online multiplayer space shooter.

name: Galbia Tales
summary: Galbia Tales is a spin off of "La Leggenda Dell'Ultimo Drago" game. It is a frenetic runner game full of action and exploration. Follow the brave swordsman of Galbia kingdom to the search of the missing daughter in 15 different game levels, you'll know a world full of mysteries and magic. Fight hordes of monsters, demons and find the right way to defeat seemingly invincible creatures. Collect coins and gems to get powerful equipment. Don't forget, the time will be your biggest enemy.

name: Gasu: The Hugging Dragon
summary: Help spread the love with a tiny dragon who loves to hug!

name: Ganbaru
summary: Ganbaru is an action-adventure platformer in development by Kevin Lopez.

name: Gaming Late at Night
summary: A horror game about gaming at night gone wrong.

name: Gamer Den
summary: Furry visual novel centered around a transfer student and his newfound friends

name: Gachi Bird
summary: Gachi Bird is a classic arcade game featuring Billy Herrington and his friends flying through obstacles in three dimensions: Hell, Heaven and Gym.

name: Galaga Arrangement
summary: The 2005 release Namco Museum Battle Collection included another game titled Galaga Arrangement. However, it was not the same game. This title was re-released on Xbox 360 in Namco Museum: Virtual Arcade. It was than re-released on the iPhone under the name Galaga Remix. It featured new bosses and weapons, as well as the original Galaga.

name: Gar's Den
summary: Will you enter the dungeon? Will you survive? Will you make fat stacks of $? Will you transform Gar's Den into Player's Den???

name: Galaxy Shooter
summary: A single starship can succeed where a squadron will fail? Ready your sky force for ruthless space battle and fly through the chaotic barrage of asteroids & bullets to attack space invasion in our alien shooter game! Upgrade your starship and put an end to the evil Kraathu Empire. Why? Because only you and your space team can restore peace in the galaxy threatened by alien invaders! Shoot ’em up, repel their galaxy attack!

name: Game of Throne
summary: Race your housemate home to take a poo

name: Garbage Crew!
summary: Garbage Crew! is a game about chaos! You work in a team with two to four players and an angry garbage truck driver. Your job is to empty garbage cans and containers. Sadly, your contract doesn't state what kind of work you are required to do, so your boss loads you with all kinds of extra tasks, including firefighting and forest work. Naturally you are completely understaffed, and your short-tempered driver has no intention of stopping the truck to wait for you, just because you couldn't empty all the garbage cans while extinguishing a raging wildfire. Luckily, there are heaps of powerups that help you with all those tasks, so your stress level won't reach dangerous heights... Or so you thought! Due to an accident in your bosses DIY time reverting device, you travel back into medieval times with seemingly no way to return and to make matters worse, your contract states that you are still required to work! So better get yourself a sword because the town is in the middle of a siege!

name: Garfield
summary: Check out the Garfield Collection!

name: Gachi Dash
summary: An exciting adventure through the most unusual places in Russia. Visit the places known to every person and feel the atmosphere of the fact that you need to escape from there as soon as possible. Run as fast as you can, but be careful, the exit path is not always straight, so you will have to avoid numerous obstacles! Try your luck in two game modes. Classic gameplay game known and understandable for every. Just jump and try not to die!

name: Galaxy Sphere
summary: Roll your ball along the platforms in one of the eight galaxies! Jump if you see a gap, and try to beat your time record!

name: Gachaminer
summary: Gachaminer is a Crypto Mining MMORPG. Learn about Mining and Crypto in Storylines and Missions, and play with thousands of other players in a persistent multiplayer world.

name: Garage Apocalypse
summary: Reinforce doors, shoot the zombies, repair your car and escape as fast as possible.

name: Garden of Strife
summary: An Infested Garden

name: Garda
summary: Garda is a 2d pixel art tower defense and exploration game. Protect your totem that is keeping your world out of the darkness. Wander across an immense desert. Learn about the weird laws of this world by using technology and energy systems to power defense turret against the numerous enemies…

name: Gaslamp Cases 2: The Haunted Village
summary: In the second part of the Match3 mystery thriller, Morgan and Jack return on another exciting mystery in London in the 19 century. Test your skills with challenging match-3 puzzles, win 20 upgrades and investigate the mystery across the five chapters!

name: Gakuen Handsome: Ito o Kashi
summary:
Heian period. An era in which many gorgeous cultures developed while being killed.
There were many handsome men who were not mentioned in history. This is a story of unknown human beings of handsome men set in the Heian period.

name: Gate of Providence
summary: Explore the continent of Iris and liberate the capital city of Eria in this turn-based fantasy RPG!

name: Garden Witch Life
summary: Journey through various distant and isolated skies, making and helping friends along the way. Sharing company with those who have stories to tell and new perspectives to discover.

name: Game Grumps: Joint Justice - Turnabout Hour
summary:
Meet your favorite YouTube duo in an intense
Ace Attorney-like game! Someone stole the 10
Minute Power Hour dinos, and only Arin & Dan
can figure out the culprit of this heinous crime
and save their friend Jory!

name: Gates of Integrity
summary: Very classic RPG

name: Gay Zodiac
summary: A Yaoi game where you date Zodiac Signs.

name: Gamecraft
summary: a tongue-in-cheek game design game

name: Gargolite
summary: Get gargoyles stoned in this top down defense shooter

name: Gallery One
summary: Walk around an art gallery. Look at art. Read comics. Talk to people. Over 100 illustrations.

name: Gartic Show
summary: Gartic Show is a draw and guess game made for streaming. Challenge the audience to guess what you are drawing.

name: Gardenia
summary:
Gardenia is a FPP gardening simulator with elements of platformer, crafting, adventure, exploration and more!

A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: Garbageland
summary: Block breaking RPG about our trash-filled future.

name: Gas vs. Dwarves
summary: Eat to grow more! Help Gas protect his home!

name: Gartic on Stream
summary: GOS is a streaming game where your audience guesses drawings made in real time.

name: Galzoo Island
summary: Leo is called a genius in using basic magic spells. But he is still learning the spells for monster capturing and he can't even tame weak monsters yet.One day he meets with a monster girl 'Captain Vanilla' and she teleports him to a mysterious island saying this will help him master his magic.

name: Galaxy Beam
summary: An arcade style shoot-em-up in four directions

name: Garden
summary: They came across a ghost with a dream like their own.

name: Gal Gun: Double Peace
summary: The Gal*Gun series is centered around a protagonist who becomes Super Popular under bewildering circumstances, forcing him to fend off hordes of girls who want to confess their love to him! Using his special Pheromone Shot, he must take aim and fire at the approaching ladies to send them into states of euphoria! Meanwhile, he must confess his love to one of the beautiful heroines in this part-shooting game, part-dating sim series!

name: Game Boy Music
summary: Game Boy Music was a rhythm game starring Barbara the Bat, which was cancelled. The game itself was a retooling of the cancelled Game Boy game called Pocket Music. Barbara the Bat would later receive a her debut in Daigassou: Band Brothers for the Nintendo DS.

name: Gardener's Path
summary:
An immersive 2D puzzle experience about sustaining natural harmony.

Gardener’s Path is a top-down turn-based puzzle game, about fighting giant insects and protecting underground gardens.

Fulfill your duty as a gardener, and fight against the pest of giant insects, to protect the ones you love.

name: "Gamer"+ Crossroad of Sympathy
summary: The definitive visual novel adaptation of the hit web comic "Gamer" is here! This definitive version contains new narration not present in the original narrative, along with story changes such as a brand new Character.

name: Galactic Gladiators
summary: Warriors from all over the galaxy came to these gladiatorial fights, including ... mushroom? a stone? it seems that the great wars are too busy for our battles of epic proportions.

name: Galactic Dreams
summary: Humanity is racing through space on the wings of hope, away from the emerging threat of a cosmic cataclysm that could spell extinction. And mysterious aliens with powers beyond imagining follow them everywhere they go.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Ebisumaru Kiki Ippatsu
summary:
Ganbare Goemon: Ebisumaru Kiki Ippatsu is a portable electronic handheld game in the Ganbare Goemon series developed and published by Konami in 1990 in Japan.
In this LCD game, Goemon has to rescue Ebisumaru who has been captured by evildoers.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Dosukoi! Harite Ichiban
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Dosukoi! Harite Ichiban is a fighting sumo game developed and published by Konami for mobile phones and released on December 16, 2002 in Japan. It is part of the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series, but was based on Ganbare Goemon 2: Kiteretsu Shougun Magginesu.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Hijutsu! Sansuu Juku
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Hijutsu! Sansuu Juku is a quiz video game released for mobile phones. It was developed and published by Konami Mobile and released on November 14, 2002 in Japanese markets. It is the first video game in the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Jetto GO! GO! GO!
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Jetto GO! GO! GO! is an action game developed and published by Konami for mobile phones and was released on March 13, 2003 in Japan. It is part of the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Karakuri Kiteretsu Race
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Karakuri Kiteretsu Race is a racing mobile phone game from the Ganbare Goemon series which was developed and published by Konami and released in May 7, 2003 in Japan. It is part of the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series.

name: Ganbare Goemon: Tentekomai-mai Meikyuu-kan
summary: Ganbare Goemon: Tentekomai-mai Meikyu-kan is a labyrinth video game developed and published by Konami Mobile Japan and released on mobile phones on May 7, 2003 in Japanese Market. It is the fifth and the last title in the Ganbare Goemon: Tsuukai Game Apli series.

name: Gal Galaxy Pain
summary: Hospital recovery ends. She has had enough! Humanity is done!

name: Ganso!! Yancha-maru
summary: Ganso!! Yancha-maru is an Action game, published by Irem, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: Game Battle Tycoon
summary: Battle with in-game games! A new kind of game battle!

name: Gakuen Handsome: Ikusei Game - Mitsurugi Sakuya no Soccer Sekai ni Hirometai
Galactic Ravager
summary: The planet earth was attacked by aliens. Only you, the captain of the aerospace forces, can save the planet from enemies. You have to protect the orbital station, as well as penetrate behind enemy lines and destroy all the aliens.

name: Galactic Invasion
summary: Aliens are invading the Galaxy. Your job, if you accept it, Major, is to stop them. Galactic Invasion will make you enjoy gameplay of old school shoot'em up with today's device capabilities. Fire!

name: Gav-Gav Odyssey
summary: Three space friends get into an unearthly adventure in which they face a variety of different tasks, which will take a lot of time to solve. Will you be able to exit the game as winners? Then be patient because the game is for those who like to think.

name: Galaxy Defense
summary: Mystic droid army invaded our planet. As a commander, you need to hold the last line of defense. Now, all forces are waiting for your orders! Place towers in perfect defense formation and let’s swipe them out!

name: Gaserb
summary: Gaserb contains difficult puzzles that can be solvable by only clever ideas. Challenge the timer bar which can change how the game works and see if you're clever and fast enough to beat it.

name: Gangsta: The Return
summary: Gangsta series will return. Now you are super gangsta soldier and need find captured virus. Use different weapons and magical skills to destroy enormous evil army

name: Galactic Federation
summary: Classical 3D space combat simulation with unique 100% dynamic destruction engine, allows you to realistically damage and burn through your enemies exactly where you hit them with blasters, causing their onboard systems and armor to melt away and fall apart. Made by solo developer.

name: Galacticon
summary: Galacticon is a video game with the look and feel of arcade cabinet games from the early 80's in the style of Williams classics: "Defender" or "Joust", with the gameplay of legendary "Jetpac", and with touches of "puzzle".

name: Gates of Siberia
summary: Racing with elements of survival and role-playing system. Travel to locations from all over the world, survive, participate in competitions, complete tasks and keep your travel blog in the new part of Wildland!

name: Gazmatera II: America's Least Wanted
summary: Find out the long story, about how the famous "generals" met and appeared in the new third-person shooter from Victor "LVL90DRU1D" Gazmanoff and his Kalifas! Take control of four survivors, Jeff, Kayla, Helga and Emina! Rush through 15 breathtaking levels and find out how the fate of heroes formed!

name: Galactic Frontier
summary: Galactic Frontier is a story focused Sci-Fi explorative twin stick shooter. Embark on an intergalactic adventure in the chaotic and war torn expanse of what was the Milky Way. Fight alongside rebels or repress them! Become a pirate or submit to the Machine Plague, choose your own destiny.

name: Galaxy Pass Station
summary: The year 3020. Be the first to meet all aliens from all over the galaxy. Check alien species and their galactic papers, manage your space station, and, please, try not to unleash a galactic war... near Earth. — Your favorite Spherical Corp.

name: Gaze of the Eyeless
summary: Gaze of the Eyeless is a 2D action adventure platformer! Choose your own path through the unwinding caverns of the underworld. Use ancient swords and guns to fight horrific monsters. Make friends, enemies, and Meet elder gods! Can you survive the unwinding caverns of the underworld?

name: Galaxity: Terminal 21 VR
summary: Visit Terminal 21, the largest shopping mall in Bangkok, Thailand, right now! You can enjoy window-shopping here. As long as you connect through VR!

name: Ganryu 2
summary: Play as Miyamoto Musasho in this beautiful 2D platformer and travel through a 17th century fantasy Japan, from north to the island of Ganryu-jima where everything happened between Musashi and Kojiro. The game is inspired by the story of Takezo Musashi from the famous novel "The Stone And The Sword".

name: Gartic.io
summary:
Welcome to Gartic.io! Playing Gartic.io you are gonna have fun guessing and drawing! Every round a Player is chosen to draw something for the others to guess what it is. The first player to achieve the goal of points will be declared the game winner. Choose between one of the groups of words that we offer and have fun with your friends!

Gartic also allows the player to create his own room and invite up to 50 friends sharing a link to the room. Choose one between the different room subjects to draw and have fun!

name: Gakuen Hyoryuu Senki
summary: Gakuen Hyoryuu Senki is a comedic visual novel.

name: Gakuen Hyouryuu Senki Dai 2 Wa
summary: Gakuen Hyouryuu Senki Dai 2 Wa is a visual novel.

name: Garden Madness
summary: Garden Madness - A game in the style of "Hit the Mole", by pressing certain buttons at a certain moment, we beat the moles emerging from their holes to dynamic music, collecting points and bonuses for successful hits in a row.

name: Gaucho and the Grassland
summary: Gaucho and the Grassland is an Animal Farm Sim game where you need to gather resources, explore the land, breed animals and much more, to overcome the challenging life on the grasslands. The world of Gaucho is a mystical wildland, inspired by South Brazil's culture and its local tales.

name: Galactic Racing Online
summary: Galactic Racing Online is an arcade style fast paced 3D futuristic racing game. Compete against 12 other players in online multiplayer, or race against AI in single player, with over 28+ tracks and 200+ vehicles to unlock.

name: Game with Car
summary: It's a game, with a car

name: Gaslamp Cases 3: Ancient Secrets
summary: Help Morgan Johnson and Jack Brown solve a new mystery case and an age-old conspiracy. Solve match3 puzzles across the continent.

name: Game Over
summary: the story will be told from the perspective of a game developer throughout the Great Depression from its beginning to its end, and how it affected him personally.

name: Gamma Space
summary: You play the role of a spaceship surrounded by an asteroid field.

name: Gambit!
summary: Gun up and wreak havoc in Gambit! – a 4-player campaign-driven shooter-adventure in a world of gangs, guns, and mayhem.

name: Game of Legends: Rise of Champions
Gall Force: Eternal Story
summary: Gall Force: Eternal Story is an Action game, developed and published by HAL Laboratory, which was released in Japan in 1986.

name: Games Sampler 2 for Windows 95
summary:
Enter into a vortex of white-knuckled adventure!
See, hear and feel for yourself how Windows 95 elevates PC gaming to a new dimension -- through the speed and power of DirectX technology; with vivid 3D graphics, video, and sound; and with online and multiplayer capability. Use this CD sampler to taste the excitement and fun of some of today's hot new generation of games!

name: Garden of Seif: Chronicles of an Assassin
summary: Garden of Seif is a narrative-driven game where choices matter. Play as Iris Lapis, an assassin navigating a world of danger, adventure, and romance. Two enemy love interests arrive and claim to be trustworthy, but can they win her heart?

name: GameBoy Wordle
summary: GameBoy Wordle is a word puzzle homebrew game for the Game Boy.

name: Galpa the no limbs guy
summary: Galpa was sleeping until he heard a sound that shook him out of bed. Galpa found a pipe out side his house. He looked inside and he got sucked in. He went to a place with shapes and more. Will Galpa get back home? 25 levels of shape blasting fun. rpg like world map

name: Gangsta Hero
summary: This is a harem to the visual novel game, love, harem, martial arts, gangs, killers this will be the core of the Mafia heroes game

name: Gamedec: Izmael Krostov
summary: New playable skin of Izmael Krostov - Old Sailor turns a cabin into a couch to login to the Net.

name: Gamedec: Dafne Bennet
summary: New playable skin of Dafne Bennet - Retro Steam Cyber Woman is taking over the cases in Virtual Worlds.

name: Gangster Granny 3
summary:
Some time had passed since Gangster Granny went on her ferocious trip to rob a bank. Those days seemed to be left behind as she now held an icecream instead of a gun, peacefully walking on the calm, sunny streets of a small village. Little did she know it was all about to change...
An evil corporation was now ruling the world, and seemed quite interested in Gangster Granny. But why? Who is behind all this?
Looks like it's time to break in, again.

name: Galactic Assault Squad
summary: Galactic Assault Squad is an open-world action-combat co-op MMO from the co-creator of Realm of the Mad God.

name: Game for Peace
summary: Game for Peace is the official Chinese version of PUBG Mobile that offers the most intense multiplayer battles on your mobile phone. Join the battle, put on your gear, and play to win. Survive in epic 100-player battles in Classic Mode, Payload Mode, the fast-paced 4v4 Team Death-match Mode, and Infection Mode. Survival is all that matters. Survive to the end to get the last laugh. Accept missions and fire at will!

name: Garenburg Penitence: The Riflebird
summary:
Garenburg Penitence is an action-puzzle arcade game and visual novel about matching sphere colors and exploring the collapsing psyche that destroyed the world.

With over 70 unique level maps, additional game modes, a level editor, and a tragic tale spanning across eight databases, learn the story of a fragile girl and her regretful actions.

If everything has a cost, then how much would it be to make the world a better place?

name: Gastro Force
summary: The player takes the role of the last soldier of the highly specialized "Gastro Force", elite troopers trained to infiltrate the enormous alien guts to fight them from the inside!

name: Galactic Nemesis
summary: Aliens are invading the galaxies and you're the only hope. Battle waves of alien races and defeat mega bosses with your powerful galactic ship. Each world offers a new set of challenges, and new species of fire shooting aliens. Upgrade your ship to help your conquer the challenges. Compete in almost 50 stages, then attempt each world's endurance mode to see if you have what it takes to save each galaxy.

name: Galagi Shooter
summary: Galagi Shooter is based on the old school arcade hit space defender game, probably one of the best game ever made. Highly playable, action-packed, this game include many aliens waves to defeat and power ups to collect.

name: Gabriel's Auditory Playground
summary: Gabriel's Auditory Playground has no graphics, no visuals, no way to experience the gameplay with your eyes. In Gabriel's Auditory Playground, your eyes have no use. Put your ears to the test and play through mini-games designed without sight in mind!

name: Gate Builders
summary: Gate Builders is a sci-fi turn-based 4X strategy game. Build space stations, manage work force, exploit, trade and transform resources. Face space pirates and enemy factions. Build, Expand, Thrive!

name: Gales of Nayeli
summary: Face an impending darkness threatening the world of Iuven alongside Nayeli and an interesting cast of warriors. Control varied battlefields in Grid-Based Strategy RPG format while interweaving character relationships to the main conflict.

name: Garage: Vamp
summary: A visual novel by the esteemed smut artist hasselnut - garage:VAMP's premise is simple, you've got a hunky vampire living in your garage who is trying to fuck your wife. Will true love prevail, or will deep repressed desires become too much to bear?

name: Game Center Club
summary: Game Center Club is a simulation game in which you will manage a game center.

name: Gallery Fake
summary: Gallery Fake is a mystery adventure visual novel based on the manga with the same name, in which you play as Fujita Reiji and must solve the mysterious events surrounding a few priceless pieces of artwork.

name: Galaxy Trek
summary: Also check out Galaxy Trek for iPad - now available in the App Store. The galaxy is being overrun by an invading horde of enemies know as Swarmers. The swarmers are fast and ferocious and attacks in swarms, hence their name. The swarmers have decimated the entire fleet of warships leaving the inhabited planets and remaining spaces stations defenseless.

name: Gachapin Bomberman
summary: Gachapin ☆ Bomberman is a video game developed and published by Hudson Soft and released on mobile devices on August 7, 2007, exclusively in Japan. It is a cross-over between the Gachapin series and the Bomberman series.

name: Gachapin & Mukku no Daiundoukai
summary: A sports minigame collection featuring characters from the Gachapin franchise and from Hudson Soft properties.

name: Galaxy Fight Club
summary:
Galaxy Fight Club is a fast-paced 3v3 multiplayer and battle royale game made to play with friends. You can choose from a number of our heroes and equip them with the best weapons to take part in our tournaments.
Unlock and level up your heroes, win key fragments from battles to open loot boxes to obtain weapons and armour to get stronger.

name: Galactic Bar Fight VR
summary:
Get ready for a Galactic Bar Fight!

Galactic Bar Fight is a fast-paced arena combat game starting in Pegasus, an intergalactic watering hole in the distant future and then take a tour across the galaxy to various environments all over.

name: Garden In!
summary: A calm and peaceful experience about growing tiny and lovely plants. Just relax, take care of your seedlings, and watch your dream garden come to life.

name: Gauntlet
summary: Based on the arcade game Gauntlet. It was released in 1988.

name: Gamma IV
summary: Gamma IV plays like the laser show of a Daft Punk concert, with electro-heavy beats and a pulsing spectrum of coloured beams, similar to the waves of audio visualization applications. The game is split up in different scenes with progressive difficulty and a single music track in the background, bridging all scenes.

name: Galactic Diner
summary: Become the best chef in the galaxy! Cook for aliens, make new friends, and go head-to-head against other chefs to win it all in a game show where the customer is always right!

name: Garden Galaxy
summary: Discover, collect and organise to create your own unique garden in this relaxing idle / creative sandbox!

name: Game of Seven
summary: Game of Seven is an original two-player turn-based board game that revolves around the number 7. In this game you will command seven angels that move in patterns of the number 7, on a seven by seven board.

name: Gates of Nesphera
summary: Cepheus Gate VR is a roguelite inspired dungeon crawler. Explore vast corridors, fight against powerful Keepers and use deadly power of Nebula to grow in strength. Be careful though, the mighty power is treacherous and can devour you if not used wisely.

name: Gardenia VR
summary: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
summary: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!

name: Galactic Explorers
summary: Galactic Explorers is a top-down 2D retro space shooter inspired by early games such as Galaxian, and Asteroids.

name: Gamer Girls: Dating Sim
summary: Date them all, win the girls over and unlock unique unique sex scenes! Gaming Girls: Dating Sim is a dating simulator with classic Tetris game. You should pass levels to see hot pictures with beautiful girls.

name: Galaxy Fighters
summary: Your mission: defend the galaxy from attacking alien ships in this classic intergalactic space battle. Aliens will attack in various formations and you must defend yourself with a battery of different weapons. A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics. Retro arcade fun for the whole family.

name: Galaxy Groove
summary:
Bring life to the Galaxy through the power of music!
Jump, swim, bounce, fly, and dance your way through 10 unique planets using simple one-tap controls. Collect stars for added challenges and bonuses, and to unlock more planets.

name: Galaxy Trucker Pocket
summary: The award-winning adaptation of Vlaada Chvátil’s award-winning board game. Build space ships, dodge meteors, and fight off bad guys, all in a quest to be the trucker with the most cosmic credits at the end of the game.

name: Gamebook
summary: Walk into the Land of Lanthir Lamath ruled by wicked skeletons and fight for your life in a thrilling adventure. It's a book. It's a game. It's a gamebook. Choose your own adventure.

name: Galactic Conflict
summary: Galactic Conflict brings Real-Time Strategy (RTS) on an unrivaled scale right to your iPad. Battle other players online controlling huge space fleets ranging from small fighters to gigantic battlecruisers. Play the single player campaign or train against the AI.

name: Gamer Girl
summary: Gamer Girl is a cancelled FMV game by Wales Interactive that was announced in 2020. In the game, the player plays as a moderator for Alexandra "Abicake99" Burton, a famous streamer, and has to help moderate her chat, her stream content and also help her make personal choices. The game was quickly cancelled after its announcement after the trailer received backlash from the online community due to the insensitive nature of the game.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Can Touch This
summary: Get some new tools and redecorate your gas station. Change walls, doors, windows and move things around. Make your own art and rival Dennis' artworks. Want to change the warehouse or the workshop? Now you can. And much, much more.

name: Gakuen Tokkyuu Hotokenser
summary: Gakuen Tokkyuu Hotokenser is an otome game, developed and published by TwoFive, which was released in Japan in 2011.

name: Galaxy Splitter
summary:
Interstellar peace is at stake and only you can save it! Accept your mission as fighter pilot in Galaxy Splitter and free all the planets from hostile spaceships!

This action game will beam you directly into a new galaxy with trigger-happy enemies and high-value cargo. Captain Smith will help start you on your galactic adventure. He’ll show you how to make your spaceship combat-ready with weapons and modules and what to collect on your missions.

name: Garbage Collect
summary: A casual game in which you operate various machines to deliver garbage to the garbage station. Control various machinery through keyboard or mouse clicks to transport garbage to the garbage station. You can also challenge to collect stars and sea lions. A total of 20 well-designed levels.

name: Galactic Liberation
summary: "Galactic Liberation" is a classic 2D arcade scrolling shooter, with a side view. Nice graphics and atmospheric music will immerse you in a space battle.

name: Galaxy Life
summary:
The universe is full of Starlings, tiny orange aliens that want to take over the galaxy. Create your own space colony, fight epic battles and discover new planets. Train your soldiers, develop your technology and create unimaginable gadgets. Enjoy with your friends in this huge social game.

Original title was delisted and shut down in 2016. This title's new owner, Phoenix Network, recreated and relaunched the title in 2022.

name: Galactic Merchant
summary:
Galactic Merchant is sci-fi business simulator (aka space tycoon game). Starting from small startup with single cargo ship you can grow your company to intergalactic monopoly.

To do so, you could trade, prospect, produce goods, smuggle, rob, give bribes, engage in politics, save lives and use many other options.
During the game you will learn many economical concepts and built-in calculation sheet will help you to use them in practice.

name: Galaxy Cat
summary: Play as Coz the Cosmic Kitten as you travel the solar system reconnecting the universe together.

name: Galaxy Citizen: Beginning
summary: You are heir to the empire,struggling to survive in the dark age in the galaxy.Fight against the Emperor. Galaxy Citizen is an Action RPG set in Space Opera world .Free to Play

name: Galaxy Citizen
summary: Galaxy Citizen is an online Action RPG set in an Alien world.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Shady Deals
summary: The uncle is back! And he has a new business on his mind… Build new things on your gas station and make some shady deals!

name: Galactic Beacon Brigade
summary:
Reconnect the galaxy Galactic Beacon Brigade is a free action video game wherein you have to reconnect the galaxy.
