Developed by TomSmizzle, this physics-based indie game has simple controls and an even-simpler objective. However, this makes it a really short experience as it doesn’t have any fail conditions, so you’re bound to get things right even if your movements are wonky. This game can feel incomplete due to its short length.

Galactic Beacon Brigade has a simple premise: reconnect the galaxy with your mouse cursor-looking spaceship. To do this, you have to fly the ship between the two pulsing points on the screen by using either the W, A, and D keys or the arrow keys to steer the ship. However, space doesn’t allow for precise turning, so expect your ship to float past and start hitting the sides of the screen like a pinball.by activating the beacons!

name: Gaia Odyssey
summary: Gaia Odyssey is a 3D action RPG that gives you a mission to save an entire kingdom.

name: Galaxy Angel Ex
summary: Galaxy Angel Ex is a "supplementary" videogame released by Broccoli. In the "main storyline," Tact and all of the Angels (including Chitose) are hanging out together on the Elsior and having fun.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Key to the Infinite Corridor
summary: Two new members join the Rune Angel Troupe, Natsume Izayoi and Roselle Mateus. Taking place 6 months after the events of Verel's Insurrection, the crew find themselves In the midst of a reassignment upheaval.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Eternal Recurrence
summary: It is set 3 months after the events of the previous game, Mugen Kairō no Kagi. The combined Angel Wing join Tact on Juno in celebrating the 5 year anniversary since the liberation of the EDEN civilization from the Val-Fasq.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Gate to the Absolute
summary: It features a brand new cast of Angels, the Rune Angel Troupe, and primarily takes place in a parallel universe called Neue.

name: Gakkou no Kaidan
summary: Gakkou no Kaidan is a game for the Sega Saturn console. It was released in 1995 to accompany the live-action movie Gakkou no Kaidan. It was available only in Japan, in Japanese.

name: Gaelco Arcade 2
summary:
The Gaelco Arcade 2 cartridge for Evercade features 6 action-packed arcade games from Spanish developer Gaelco, featuring Big Karnak’s hack-and-slash fun, TH Strikes Back’s sci-fi platforming, World Rally 2’s high-speed racing, Maniac Square’s brain-bending puzzling, and competitive sporting action with Squash and Touch and Go!

The cartridge includes following 6 games:
- Big Karnak
- TH Strikes Back: Thunder Hoop 2
- World Rally 2
- Maniac Square
- Squash
- Touch and Go

name: Galactic Center for Etymological Research
summary: You goal is to map out planets in different systems. You do so by receiving a word representing a name and swapping letters until you get other possible words with the same letters, which unlock upgrades or new locations.

name: Garden Life: A Cozy Simulator
summary: Garden Life is a gardening sandbox game in which players can plant, cultivate, decorate, and manage their own garden.

name: Gakuen Alice: Kira-kira Memory Kiss
summary: Gakuen Alice: Kira Kira Memory Kiss is a PlayStation 2 game based off the anime Gakuen Alice.

name: Gamedle
summary:
Gamedle is a game made for gamers, created by a single developer. Inspired by Wordle, Framed and the other spinoffs.

Guess the videogame by its cover, every day a new game.
You can also try the Unlimited mode to play non-stop.

name: Galaxy of Pen and Paper +1 Edition
summary:
Create your own game master and RPG party, as they roleplay, explore distant planets in their imagination, fight weird aliens and save the galaxy in the era of dial-up internet and floppy disks!

The +1 edition includes: new characters, classes, skills, planets, quests, and more than 3 hours of gameplay!

name: Gambaru Amabie-chan
summary: This is an action game created by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Game & Watch Donkey Kong Jr.
summary: A recreation of the Donkey Kong Jr. Game & Watch handheld.

name: Game & Watch Mario's Cement Factory
summary: A recreation of the homonymous Game & Watch handheld.

name: Galxagar
summary: "Don't go to Galxagar"; a phrase uttered by many who have traversed its rim. Untold treasures, and terrors, await within its blackened depths. Ready your craft, spacefarer, because you're about to enter the most dangerous sector in all the stars. Get ready.. for Galxagar!

name: Game of the Dead
summary: Gun down large hordes of Zombies and try to survive the night! Game Of The Dead is a casual Post-Apocalyptic Horror game with rogue-lite elements. You can build card decks that will allow you to quickly overcome the odds and help you fight against the thousands of Zombies that get in your way.

name: Garlant: My Story
summary: I am an adventurer who just graduated from college. In pursuit of the challenge, I came to the distant border of the Kingdom: the town of Garlant in the Doly region. I will write a new chapter in my life here. It will be a wonderful adventure story.

name: Game Cycle
summary: Relive the bygone era of CD-ROM shareware! As a recently-contracted games analyst, you are tasked by the CEO of Best Value Games to make sure the games set to be included in their upcoming release are up to code. How much you get paid depends on how much ground you cover!

name: Game Over: A Musical RPG??
summary: An adventure RPG with rhythm based combat encounters, zany characters, moral conundrums and platforming elements? Oh sorry I didn't know this was a question. Yes.

name: Gatecrasher
summary: Gatecrasher is a game.

name: Galaxy Trader
summary: Explore the galaxy in this peaceful space trading RPG

name: GameStart Pixel Battle
summary:
The official game of GameStart, Southeast Asia's Premier Gaming Convention.

A mysterious figure has been sabotaging games, taking the fun out of them and making them almost impossible to play. GameStart's resident gamer girl, Alyse, dives in to fix things and needs your help to get to the bottom of this!

name: Gale of Windoria
summary: Soar on the breezes around the world in your flying Beakle, upgradable with parts to spread your accessible areas. Make use of the elementals not only in turn-based battles, but in dungeon gimmicks as well by combining character abilities. Find also the Quartzes to strengthen your party, acquire skills and techniques. Not to forget the entire world drawn with nostalgic pixel artworks!

name: Game Type DX
summary: Help Hoodie Girl fight the evil MediaBall's inane advertisements! It's a high score shooter in which each loop increases the speed and difficulty!

name: Galactic Pioneer
summary: Based on the classic Lander games that were made popular during the 1980's, in Galactic Pioneer you must navigate an exploration module across ten varied and increasingly difficult planets with limited fuel and even more limited lives.

name: Galaxy Arena
summary: Galaxy Arena Space Battle is an addicting, space war strategy game. Join us in this space odyssey & be part of the guards of galaxy who are protecting the starcitizens in this huge intergalactic space war. Build your starship armada with dreadnoughts & other spaceships. Equip your armada with anti matter, engines & interstellar weapons to protect your space men & starcitizens in your frontier. Enjoy adjustable 3D view of the space war/ battle. Battle against other players in ship vs ship idle combat.

name: Game Party
summary: Game Party is a game published by Coconuts Japan Entertainment Co., Ltd., which was released in Japan in 1990 for the Nintendo Famicom.

name: Gangs of Sherwood
summary: Fight the armies of the Sheriff of Nottingham and lead the rebellion, solo or in co-op with up to 4 players. Play as one of the Merry Men, combine your attacks, and free the people in this futuristic dystopia inspired by the legend of Robin Hood.

name: Gary Grigsby's World at War: A World Divided
summary: Gary Grigsby’s World At War: A World Divided brings you to back to the dawn of the greatest and most terrible war the world has ever seen. Take command in this dynamic, turn-based strategy game of World War II that puts you in the role of some of the most legendary leaders of history. In Gary Grigsby’s World At War: A World Divided, you have complete control over the production, research and military strategy for your side.

name: Galacticorp
summary: Galacticorp is a multiplayer incremental trading and crafting sim. Grow your wealth through co-operation or conquest. Navigate Galacticorp's player-driven economy to climb to the top, unlocking new passive and active gameplay mechanics as your prestige grows.

name: Garden's Bane: DG's Quest
summary: This is a difficult precision platformer.

name: Galactic Escape
summary: In this top-down roguelike shooter game you go through levels of enemies to escape [???]. You do this with the help of weapons and items you find on the way. You can equip up to two weapons. Mix and match the weapons and items you find to make combos that work together.

name: Galaxy Frontier
summary: A shoot-em-up for Windows by Hello World Project.

name: Garden of Seif: Curse of Gravehollow Peaks
summary: Lost in the cursed mountains of Gravehollow Peaks, two rival assassins must set their differences aside and find a way home... unless something finds them first. A story-rich fantasy with magic, romance, and choices that matter.

name: Gadgets: Design It, Build It, Play It
summary:
Gadgets: Design It! Build It! Play It! is a 3D variation of The Incredible Machine. You solve puzzles by arranging an assortment of levers, belts, motors and other items to achieve a goal. The game comes with timed levels and a sandbox mode. You can fully rotate the camera to observe your constructions and there are 8 settings for more than 50 game levels, along with a few tutorials.

The goal is to move a fuzzy monster to a designated spot in the level, using items such as flashlights, basketballs, trampolines and fans. The game depends on gravity as the primary key to all puzzles. The solutions require a pre-selected array of pieces to be arranged in certain ways. The game comes with a "Builder", a construction set where you can design your own levels with over 65 parts in the toybox. These can be exported and shared online.

name: Garbageboi+
summary: As a Garbageboi, you clean the streets while avoiding insane traffic and the deadly stares from the people living there.

name: Gadkiy Ya 2
summary: Despicable Me 2 is a bootleg video game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the movie of the same name.

name: Gals Panic II
summary:
New features includes 8-way joystick, stereo audio, and the Card Dispenser option.

A stage begins with player at the edge of a randomly chosen rectangle. Capturing an area can no longer be done by moving cursor to the border of the background image.

The gauge is now changed to a time-based gauge, called time gauge. Time gauge is full at the beginning of a round or when player continues. When the gauge reaches below a certain point (as indicated by purple arrow), the background image changes, with time gauge drains in slower rate, until the image is changed back to normal.

name: Gals Panic 3
summary: Gals Panic 3 is the third game in the Gals Panic Series. It features FAR more realistic models of girls and even in paintings! It was released in 1995 as of the experiment of Kaneko's new arcade system, the Kaneko Super Nova System.

name: Galt-Rio Maximum Position
summary: A shoot-'em-up with more dialogue than most, just don't run into your wingman in mid-exposition... the graphics are all pretty nice, although it seems odd all the shots are simple yellow squares. Movement is via the arrow keys, X shoots, while Z purchases whatever power-up is available, Gradius-style, from the bar below.

name: Gamer Girls: Futanari
summary: Gamer Girls: Futanari is a classic visual novel and casual puzzle game with and beautiful sexy scenes. You need to match blocks to pass level.After each passed level you gonna be surprised with unique sex scenes with our girls!All characters in this game are over the age of 18

name: Garden Guardian
summary: Take control of master gardener Snippy Shrubs and keep your garden safe at all costs! A new take on classic LCD games, rethought through a modern lens! Complete objectives through 18 Trial levels, or hop into the four Endless levels to show that you can garden with the best of them!

name: Gangstar New York
summary: Welcome to the Big Apple, a huge free-to-play social sandbox ripe for the taking. Race, shoot, steal, and jetpack your way to the top of the underworld in a near-future New York. Claim the Kingpin title, change the game for everyone and reap the rewards. Your city, your rules.

name: Gates of Devoroth
summary: Travel through the Gates of Devoroth and explore a shattered world, on your own or with friends. Find the lost travel-wards to unlock new locations via the ancient Devorothian gate system. Gather loot and progress your character through experience and equipment.

name: Galactic Thunderdome
summary: Galactic Thunderdome is a 2D sci-fi platform brawler with a focus on physics-based mayhem. Best your friends with a vast array of weapons and gadgets in a world rich with emergent gameplay, explosive antics, and bloody remains.

name: Gaz
summary: Gaz is a boomer shooter heavily inspired by the pioneers of the FPS genre, such as Doom or Duke Nukem. Dive into dirty, post-communist Poland and fight for your survival. If you think you can save the world, you're already dead.

name: Galactic Glitch: Prologue
summary:
Galactic Glitch is a space-roguelike with fast and physical combat. You fight in bubbles of glitched spacetime, hurling rocks, bouncing foes off walls and destroying your multi-part enemies piece-by-piece in tough-but-fair, souls-inspired combat. Explore, destroy, die, repeat.

The Prologue features two full levels, each with with their own unique enemies and environments, multiple Challenge modes, where players face enemies in arena style combat, as well as three NG+ modes, that each offer new enemies and increased variety of combat encounters.

name: Gamma Nocturne 1
summary: Gamma Nocturne 1 is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. A research mission on a newly discovered earth-like planet has failed. You and your crew must stop the members of the new race from reaching Earth. How could you know that this frozen alien would come to life when thawed?

name: Gamer Girls 18+
summary: Our Gamer's Club is full of sexy loveable girls! Will you solve the puzzle into their panties? "Gamer Girls 18+" is a game combined with pretty girl, visual novel and awesome mechanics. Cute and sexy girl in different states. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Galaia
summary: Venture into the beautiful Region of Galaia in this Action-Adventure Roguelike and follow the quest for the powerful and rare Relics created by the craftsman known as The Artisan long time ago.

name: Garden of the Mind
summary: You're in charge of managing a garden. Planting new plants and de-weeding any pesky weeds that show up. The catch is that this garden happens to reside within somebody's mind. Your work will improve their mental health.

name: Gakkou de Atta Koii Hanashi
summary: A parody of the Apathy series that combines the saga's traditional horror and murder with romance elements.

name: Gakkoi: Ai to Noroi to Valentine
summary:
I had to transfer to Narushin Gakuen because of my parents' job. On the first day of my new school, I was approached by a fortune teller on the road.

"...You'll die in another month"

Suddenly, my life is over.

Continuing on, the fortune teller says, to avoid that death, it seems that I have to find a "heartfelt loved one"...

Is love or death waiting!? A life-threatening love story begins here!!

name: Ganba Jack
summary: Haramaself's unique take on FOO Suke's favorite Moon Patrol to commemorate the 5th anniversary of the game Ganba. Try to conquer all 6 stages!

name: Game Dev Arcade
summary: Game Dev Arcade is a collection of indie mini-games developed by Bulwark Creative. The source code will be available so you can see how they were developed! Play the games yourself, and then check out all the nitty gritty details that go in to making simple video games.

name: Gal Guardians: Demon Purge
summary:
When a demon's castle darkens the land, two sisters challenge its halls. Together they can break the curse.

Players take control of the two sisters with different attacks and capabilities to challenge the demon castle and the bosses waiting within. Discover new routes through the castle using the sisters' unique abilities!

The stars of Grim Guardians are the long-distance focused "Shinobu Kamizono" and the close-range brawler "Maya Kamizono." Players will need to consider the situation when choosing which sister to control as they make their way through the castle, investigating the mystery of what happened to their school and its students.

Other features include 2-player co-op with special actions, extensive difficulty options with the "Style System," unique changes on repeat plays, and most importantly the quality and challenge players have come to expect from Inti Creates titles, this time with a new gothic horror aesthetic.

name: Garden Gray The
summary: An April Fools parody game based on The Gray Garden. It plays much like the original The Gray Garden, with the same graphics, save for one difference - all of the characters are the opposite gender of what they were in The Gray Garden.

name: Galaxy Survivors
summary: Shoot alien invaders, upgrade your ship, level up your weapons and save planets to defend against the invasion. Choose your favorite between the different unlockable ships and buy perks between your runs to ensure victory. After you triumph, hunt for achievements and ascend to save more universes

name: Galaxy Revo
summary: Destroy enemy spaceships and achieve the highest record!

name: Gamma 19
summary: Gamma 19 is an action RPG with beat 'em up battle mechanics. Punch and shoot your way through robots, worms, and creatures from another dimension in this strange new world!

name: Gaze Into Fate
summary: A meditative and story-driven puzzle game, where you must discover answers to decisions, we all have to make. Can you make a change in a world of endless wars?

name: Ganbare Morikawa Kun 2nd PET ON TV
summary:
Taking the nature of virtual pets to an altogether deeper level, Pet in TV lets you raise an artificial pet (P.I.T.), train it to obey you, feed and pamper it, and teach it everything it needs to know about its new virtual world.

Though the P.I.T.'s outward appearance is akin to a robotic motorised egg, with the right nurturing it can grow and become more intelligent just like a real pet. Once it is fully trained, your P.I.T. can then explore its virtual world in search of valuable AI-chips that can later be used to build the ultimate Gold P.I.T. pet.

Each P.I.T. has its own personality, which you can choose before it is "born"; cheeky ones tend to be more adventurous, quiet ones more obedient - the choice of P.I.T. personality governs just how you and your P.I.T. will get along!

name: Game Nihonshi: Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga
summary: Game Nihonshi: Kakumeiji Oda Nobunaga is a Strategy game, developed and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: GameBreak
summary: GameBreak is a local multiplayer Mini Game Collection. That requires 2 Players to play.

name: Gakuen Heaven: Boy's Love Scramble! Type B
summary:
Gakuen Heaven: Boy's Love Scramble! Type B version removes gambling references to obtain a lower CERO rating.

It also adds an anti-flicker function and support for progressive scan output.

name: Gakuen Heaven: Okawari!
summary: A visual novel based on the anime Gakuen Heaven.

name: Garin Game: Curse of Revival Ceremony
summary:
MAMUI studio presents a suspense visual novel adapted from Thai top black fantasy novel –Garin Game : Curse of Revival Ceremony-- and let’s you decide your ending!

In the midnight of night of the month, without the moonlight, a school darkness and silence. Then a candle light show a shadow of horror scene in a classroom.
An unknown alphabet is written all over the floor to magic circle. In the middle of the magic circle showing someone blood.
…This is a part of murder scenes climax in the school!

name: Galidor Quest
summary:
The Outer Dimension is under attack from the tyrannical warlord Gorm, who will stop at nothing until everything is either under his rule or destroyed. As a native of this dimension, you have the power to instantly swap arms and legs with those of any other being; an ability referred to as "glinching". Could finding the strongest limbs be the key to stopping Gorm?

Galidor Quest is an online role-playing game based on LEGO's Galidor franchise. Players can choose from a selection of five species when creating their character, with the ability to start with the arms and legs of any of those species. The player character's statistics are improved by solving puzzles, completing tasks assigned by NPCs (which are usually in the form of mini-games that take place in the same level), and defeating other characters in challenges.

"Challenges" are duels where the player must guess whether a given statistic is better than their opponent's. If the player guesses correctly, they can choose to glinch their limbs with those of their opponent, which can be useful if the opponent has limbs with better stats; however, if the player guesses incorrectly, the opponent can choose to take the player's higher-levelled limbs instead. There is an inventory system for storing quest items and a total of four worlds to explore.

name: Garden Tails
summary:
"The most relaxing puzzle game out there"

If you love wildlife and nature or are just looking for a calming time-killer, then you’ll love this game!
Enter a peaceful world and build your own garden. Complete match 3 puzzles to unlock flowers, bushes, and friendly animals.
Watch your plot become a haven for all types of life - from common critters to majestic rarities!
Unravel the charming histories and backstories of the animal friends you meet along the way.
Relax and enjoy a sense of peace and seclusion. Plants gently sway in the breeze, birds sing, and butterflies drift by.
In a world bursting with life, how many new plants and creatures will you find?

name: GastroEx
summary:
Explore diseases and conditions of the gastrointestinal (GI) tract and perform surgical procedures on virtual patients with our video game for medical professionals, Gastro Ex.
Our fully-responsive patient anatomy allows you to perform hyper-realistic GI procedures: remove polyps using snares and forceps, treat AVMs and bleeds using APC, perform biopsies, administer injections, and much more.

name: Game Gear Micro Black
summary:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Sonic the Hedgehog
Out Run
Puyo Puyo 2
Royal Stone

name: Game Gear Micro Blue
summary:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Sonic Chaos
Gunstar Heroes
Sylvan Tale
Baku Baku Animal

name: Game Gear Micro Yellow
summary:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Shining Force: The Sword of Hajya
Shining Force Gaiden: Ensei – Jashin no Kuni he
Shining Force Gaiden: Final Conflict
Nazopuyo Aruru no Ru

name: Game Gear Micro Red
summary:
One of the four different models in the Game Gear Micro line-up, which includes four games:

Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible Special
Revelations: The Demon Slayer
Columns
Shinobi

name: Game Gear Micro White
summary: A special edition of the Game Gear Micro included in the Aleste Collection: Game Gear Micro Limited Edition.

name: Gayandere
summary: You go to a mountain chalet after a recent breakup. There, strange things are going to happen...

name: Garbanzo Quest
summary: Garbanzo Quest! The crazy bullet-heck platformer where your main weapon is your own spit! Help Garbanzo (and Pinto if you have a buddy) save their Friends from the evil Billi' Bones and his wacky world full of hand-crafted challenges, secrets, and branching paths!

name: Garden Business
summary: Create your own farm, collect the grown crops and sell them, build your own house and improve it.

name: Garden Simulator
summary: Plant, design, harvest. With Garden Simulator you'll get your own allotment, place deco elements and cultivate plants to harvest and sell them. Get ready for a beautiful time in nature. Always remember: A garden is a delight to the eye and a solace for the soul.

name: Gargoyles Remastered
summary: Gargoyles Remastered is an artfully crafted revival of the 1995 SEGA Genesis classic 16-bit side-scrolling platform adventure. Relive the epic journey of Goliath and the Gargoyles featuring enhanced visuals, animations, and SFX, all inspired by the acclaimed animated series. The world of Gargoyles comes to life with a level of detail that will thrill fans of the animated series and retro gaming enthusiasts alike. Experience classic gameplay that stays authentic to its predecessor while including new features such as achievements, gameplay rewind, and more!

name: Galaxy Fräulein Yuna Remix
summary: Galaxy Fräulein Yuna Remix is an updated re-release of the original 1992 Yuna game, enhanced by improving the graphics and adding new animation cutscenes.

name: Gazelle in a Winter Coat
summary: Some top-down narrative adventure whimsy | A pixel and Ink world, seeped in mystery | Magic, tea, and music to note | ...something something... | Gazelle in a Winter Coat!

name: Gangnam Style Massacre
summary:
Gangnam Style Massacre was a mobile game released in 2012. The game is based on the PSY song "Gangnam Style", which was at the time the most viewed YouTube video of all time. In the game, you play as a school girl who is equipped with a bow and arrow and your goal is to break the vase on top of PSY's head.

On December 14th, 2012, the game was reworked into a completely different game called Gangnam Dance School. This was due to the developer fearing the title and setting on the game was too similar to the Sandy Hook Massacre.

For the following 10 years, the game was considered lost media, until it was later rediscovered on June 18th, 2022 by computerdude77. The game is now downloadable again on the Internet Archive.

name: Gawr Gura: Quest for Bread
summary: An interdimensional, time-traveling, action-platforming adventure game featuring everyone's favorite shark.

name: Garage Flipper
summary: Garage Flipper is a game where you get to be a builder and renovator of garages and car repair shops. Your task is to complete jobs and build up your empire by buying and restoring old facilities. Grab your hammer, your mortar, and get to work!

name: Galactoids: Galactic Invaders
summary: Battle swarms of Galactic Invaders in this action-packed retro-inspired arcade shoot em up. May the Nerd be with you.

name: Galaxi Taxi
summary: Galaxi Taxi is a hybrid of Story-Driven Action-Adventure, Shoot’em and Boss Fight, and you’re a taxi crew in the classy 90s animation art style. Drive your taxi and discover the depths of a rural outer space, a muddy milky way, a cosmic dust flooding the taxi and an ubiquitous smog.

name: Gatedelvers
summary: Gatedelvers is a dungeon-crawling roguelite. Fight, sneak, cast and jump your way through hostile worlds, alone or with friends. Make use of everything you find and upgrade your gear to your liking. Discover the lost worlds beyond the Gates.

name: Gachi Adventure: Billy's Legacy
summary: Gachi Adventure: Billy's Legacy is a truly open-world role-playing game. You will find a diverse plot with a unique atmosphere of Gachimuchi, a whole city available for free study, and intense card battles.

name: Galactix
summary: Galactix is a space shmup homebrew developed for the Pokémon Mini.

name: Game Hero
summary: Game Hero is a Rhythm Homebrew game developed for the Virtual Boy.

name: Garfield: Lasagna Party
summary: Garfield Lasagna Party is a party game offering more than 30 mini-games. The challenges are varied and test both the player's cleverness and dexterity. All of these can be played solo or in multiplayer mode for up to four people.

name: Galaxian
summary: A space shooter with a VFD display.

name: Galaxian
summary: A port for handheld devices.

name: Galaxian2
summary: A port for handheld devices.

name: Galaxian
summary: A port for handheld devices.

name: Gangnam Dance School
summary: Gangnam Dance School is a mobile game based around Gangnam Style.

name: Gasoline Gypsies Game
summary:
The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a retro 2-D action platform game. Play as Caleb, Steve, Joe, and Neal as they try to make it to the top.

As a member of the Gasoline Gypsies you will run, jump, and rock your way through various levels. Find hidden items and power-ups along the way. Use your instruments to defeat opponents. You will encounter broken strings, zombie tuners, deranged groupies, and more on your way to the stage. At the end of each level you will face off with a rival group.

Listen to 8-bit renditions of original Gasoline Gypsies music as you travel across Michigan. On your adventure you will unlock levels, costumes, mini games and more. Compete for dominance on the online leaderboard or team up with a friend for local co-op. The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a colorful non violent game intended for all ages.

name: Game of Dragons
summary:
Card deck building full 3D RPG game.
Subdue monsters and collect materials to craft gears.
Assembles seals that can be mounted on equipment.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Party Time
summary: The party is about to start with new content in this free DLC. Collectables, popularity boosts and ice cream to get everyone excited!

name: Galaxy of Void: Bounty Hunter
summary: An action-adventure roguelike with a bit of RPG tossed in. Shoot, defend, combine found items in an unexpected way. Complete contracts and uncover secrets to defeat the mysterious enemy. Ahead is a labyrinth filled with insidious dangers, anomalies and many rewards.

name: Galaxy Games StarPak 2
summary: Galaxy Games StarPak 2 is an arcade game released in 1998 by Creative Electronics & Software. It is a multigame conversion kit for Galaxy Games-branded arcade machines, adding additional games. It features unique versions of Pac-Man and Ms. Pac-Man not found elsewhere, which feature two-player cooperative modes. The games are controlled using a trackball.

name: Gamedec: Definitive Edition - Free Characters Bundle
Gamedec: Definitive Edition
summary: Gamedec is a single-player cyberpunk isometric RPG. You are a game detective, who solves crimes inside virtual worlds. Use your wits to gather info from your witnesses and suspects, getting to the bottom of deceptive schemes. The game continually adapts to your decisions and never judges.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East 2: Steel Inferno
summary: Steel Inferno puts the spotlight on several major offensives that influenced the course of the war in the East, while opening up new areas of the War in the East 2 map. With 8 new Scenarios and 2 new Campaigns, it will significantly expand your War in the East 2 experience.

name: Garry's worst fear
summary:
Garry's worst fear is a TopDown point and click, turn based fighting game.
through garry's eyes you must face his worst fears in his cochemard

name: Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum
summary: Garbage Pail Kids are back in this Long-Lost, All-New platforming adventure. Featuring four playable characters, six secret-filled levels, and a trading-card system, Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum is a throwback to the golden era of 80s gaming.

name: Galactic Story
summary: Galactic Story - Top Down Shooter, the player is given a choice of three different types of spaceships, each of them is upgraded right during the game, dodging enemy projectiles, the player destroys enemies and collects various bonuses.

name: Garnet Cradle
summary:
Miku belongs to the literature club. One day, she takes charge of writing a scenario of a play staged at the school festival and is given the original book. As she reads it, she gradually feels doubtful about its ending.

Several days later, she accidentally falls down into a mysterious fountain that is located deep inside the school and goes to another world. There also live her friends and classmates, but they show different personalities to her. Like this, she starts living at two worlds, but the same story written in the book happens in another world and a tragic ending happens.... When she notices, she comes back to the real world. However, time has gone back and she is given the original book again.

She finally understands that the real world and the other world are like a mirror and repeat the same time. She decides to rewrite the story to avoid a tragic ending for the future of her beloved person. Who will Miku save? Who will Miku hurt? No one knows until the end of the story... No one knows if she will be able to save her beloved person....

name: Gakuen Rensenki
summary: An otome game based on the popular bonus drama CD of the Sangoku Rensenki series.

name: Gallery: Moa's Room
summary: Gallery: Moa's Room is a puzzle first-person single horror game. Wandering through the museum, you were trapped in a hidden room. You should find a way to escape the room by following some precautions prepared by the museum.

name: GameKey: Disney Princess - Rescue Race / Memory Chase
summary: Rescue Race / Memory Chase is a GameKey cartridge designed to be used with Disney Princess Jakks Pacific Plug & Play with GameKey compatibility. It contains two games based on Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarves.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Tennis / Disney Face Chase
summary:
An expansion the Jakks Pacific Disney Plug & Play. It contains two games:

- Disney Sports Tennis
A basic Disney-themed tennis game

- Disney Face Chase
A puzzle game, where the player matches pictures of famous Disney characters, such as Mickey Mouse.

name: GameKey: Spider-Man - Black Cat / Doc Ock
summary: GameKey: Spider-Man – Black Cat / Doc Ock is an expansion cartridge for Jakks Pacific’s plug-and-play Spider-Man TV game. It introduces several additional games and challenges themed around encounters with Doctor Octopus and Black Cat.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Bowling / Goofy's Underwater Adventure
summary: An expansion the Jakks Pacific Disney Plug & Play. It contains two games.

name: GameKey: Disney - Disney Sports Tennis / Disney Face Chase / The Riches of Agrabah with Disney
summary: An expansion for the Disney plug & play by Jakks Pacific.

name: GameKey: Namco - Dig Dug / New Rally X
summary:
An expansion (GameKey) for Namco Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with consoles with the compatibility code "NM".

Included games:

- Dig Dug
- New Rally-X

name: GameKey: Namco - Pac-Man / Bosconian / Rally-X
summary:
An expansion (GameKey) for Namco Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with consoles with the compatibility code "NM".

Included games:

- Pac-Man
- Bosconian
- Rally-X

name: GameKey: Star Wars - Yoda's Escape / Turret Defense
summary: An expansion (GameKey) for the Star Wars Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles. It works with the consoles with "SW" compatibility.

name: GameKey: Dora the Explorer - Soccer / Dora's Star Mountain Adventure
summary: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Nick SpongeBob SquarePants - Sponge Pop / Snowball Showdown
summary: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Nicktoons - Nicktoons Volleyball / Birdie Putt
summary: An expansion (GameKey) for Nickelodeon Jakks Pacific plug & play consoles with the compatibility code "NK".

name: GameKey: Namco - Pac-Man / Bosconian
summary: An expansion (GameKey) for plug & play consoles with "NM" compatibility.

name: Garnet Cradle Portable: Kagi no Himemiko
summary: A single-player romance visual novel developed by Spica and published by Idea Factory for the PlayStation Portable. Ported from the original PC release, this version adds new opening animation, fresh CG artwork, and other interface enhancements.

name: Garnet Cradle: Sugary Sparkle
summary: Fandisc of Garnet Cradle.

name: Gabrielle
summary: Gabrielle is an Action game, developed and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 1987.

name: Gamma64
summary: Gamma 64 is a ROM Hack created by iProgramInCpp, with 72 Stars.

name: Game of Dragons: Deluxe Edition
summary: This bundle includes the Game of Dragons base game and 7 DLCs.

name: Gakuen K: Wonderful School Days
summary: Gakuen K is an otome visual novel based on K Project by GoHands and GoRa featuring an original character exlusive to the game, Konohana Saya, as the protagonist.

name: Gachinco Tennis S
summary:
Gachinco Tennis S is a tennis battle game with flashy magical ball attacks that can be activated with a single button.

There are 24 characters with different magic and abilities. The game starts with 12 characters and others are unlocked by defeating them in invasion matches after winning in the tournament mode.

The game uses a tag team match with original rules, after selecting 2 characters it plays like a singles match but the characters can swap at any time during a rally. Seize victory by using two types of magic and swap characters depending on the situation.

name: Gatekeeper
summary: Gatekeeper is a fast-paced rogue-like. Go on a quest to chase down Chaos and reclaim the stolen Heart of Time, fighting your way through relentless enemy forces. Play solo or in 4-player co-op and become the next Gatekeeper!

name: Gachi-Natsu
summary: It was a sweltering hot day when I met him. During summer vacation, a young man who had failed his university entrance exam received a tutor to help him with his studies. He started living together with a handsome, muscular man, but! He is a cock-loving, energetic, and dirty tutor!

name: Gambit Gun
summary: Gambit Gun is a topdown roguelite in a scifi world. You're a bounty hunter, ready to embark in bounties to hunt outlaws and receive juicy rewards!

name: Gabenwood: 99 Hidden Bucks
summary: This is a hidden objects puzzle game what will test your wit and attentivnes. Save the Universe from destruction! Go to the Gabenwoods and find 99 bucks transferred there by some evil guy from our world.

name: Galshell 2
summary: Galshell 2 is a self-described "grotesque shooting game."

name: Garden Renovator
summary: Garden Renovator is an engaging simulator allowing you to take on the mantle of a professional gardener. Use various fun tools to your advantage and make your clients happy with your garden designs!

name: Gashi Shachi no Sachi
summary:
This game is browsing the internet for pages that don't exist, starting with the mysterious homepage "GashiShachiNoSachi".

When you start the game, you will see a screen that looks like an operating system with sound effects. First, try logging in and launching your browser.
Browsers come with back, forward, refresh, and home buttons that are useful for browsing.
You can jump directly to a page by entering the URL in the address field and clicking the Go button.

On some pages, objects can be got by clicking on them.
The object you get will be displayed in the eyedropper field of the browser.
The object can be attached to a some object, and if the content of the attachment is correct, an event will occur.
When the event occurs, you can go to another link.

Enjoy surfing the net.

name: Gauntlet: Slayer Edition - Lilith the Necromancer Pack
summary: Play as the newest adventurer to enter the Gauntlet - Lilith the Necromancer. Using her expertise in dark magic and her knowledge of the Book of the Dead, Lilith summons a pack of undead skeletons to rise from the ground and strike her enemies before they quickly vanish. She also has the ability to Ghostwalk through her foes to either slow them down or make a hasty retreat.

name: GasZilla
summary: A huge lizard, like Godzilla, has awakened after a thousand-year sleep and is going to destroy everything in its path. Help bring humanity back to the stone age as soon as possible.

name: Gatekeeper: Eclipse
summary: Fast-paced rogue-lite shooter. Gatekeeper: Eclipse is a prologue ver. of the game Gatekeeper. Go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe and shoot your way through the hordes of machine enemies in solo or in co-op with friends!

name: Gamera Dream Battle
summary: A VMU game released with Godzilla Generations.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Galga
summary:
Galga is a multiplayer digital card game in which your greatest enemy is your own hubris. It has deep gameplay, handcrafted with love.

Play cards on the wheel to decide your fate. But beware: the more cards on the wheel, the more dangerous they become.

name: Game Boy Camera: Gold Zelda Edition
Gang of Dummizz
summary:
After being wrongly accused by their former boss, Big Mum and her former colleagues decide to form the Gang of Dummizz. Their goal: to rob the bank where they were employed.

The aim is to steal as many valuable items as possible within a given time, while sparing hostages and never ending up in prison.

name: Galah Galah
summary:
A series of spacey experiences !

Sound is important!

name: Gardens of Vextro
summary: A chain game anthology by eight members of the Vextro community. Developed sequentially, with each game responding to all previous entries.

name: Galaga Remix
summary: A modified version of Galaga, released first in the Namco Museum Remix compilation. Pac-Man rolls through a track while the Wii Remote is used to shoot Galaga enemy ships.

name: Gator Panic Remix
summary: A remixed version of Gator Panic, originally a redemption game, later ported for Wii in the Namco Museum Remix compilation.

name: Gator Panic
summary: A digital port of Gator Panic (which is a redemption game), released only for iOS, that was delisted in 2015.

name: Gaplus
summary: A port of Gaplus developed by M2 for the NES capabilities, released in Namco Museum Archives (Namcot Collection).

name: GamePigeon
summary: Have fun with your friends and family by playing this collection of excellent multiplayer games via iMessage!

name: Gasnator
summary: You are hero super soldier Gasnator. Kill and destroy different enemies and find magic crystal in different areas.

name: Garden
summary:
After finding out, you seem to be lost in a strange garden...
I wonder how do you get out of here?
Use your wits and ideas to make the escape successful.

name: Gall Force - Eternal Story
summary: A graphical adventure game based off the Gall Force anime franchise published and developed by ScapTrust in 1987 in Japan.

name: Gao Gao! 1st: Radical Sequence
summary: The protagonist of the game is a college student named Yuuji Shibata. One evening, just after hearing on the news that someone has stolen a tiger, he goes out to a convenience store. On the way back, in a dark alley, he notices a strange creature, a young girl with cat ears and tail. She doesn't seem to remember anything about herself, except her name beginning with the syllable "Mi...", which afterwards earns her the nickname Mi. Yuuji brings her to his house and tries to introduce her to the world of humans. (which, naturally, also involves techniques of human procreation). But will Yuuji be able to keep Mi as his companion (sexual and otherwise), or will he have to face her mysterious past?..

name: Game of Empires: Warring Realms
summary:
In GOE, you can choose a civilization with whom you can explore a world you're free to conquer. In doing so, you can establish an empire and immerse yourself in different multilayered stories as you discover ancient civilizations, all while setting forth on an epic expedition towards the fabled Atlantis!
Whether you wish to forge diplomatic ties in a bid to peacefully form alliances or throw yourself into military ventures in an attempt to ruthlessly expand your empire, you'll always have the chance to make history, for better or for worse.

name: Galves Adventure
summary: A game made by On Nakayama to celebrate the birth of a friend's baby.

name: Gakuen Handsome
summary: A classic boy's love parody visual novel, the first in the Gakuen Handsome series which would even have its own anime in 2016. Originally released as a demo on August 29, 2010 during COMITIA 93, a Tokyo doujinshi convention.

name: Garten of Banban
summary: Enter Banban's Kindergarten, and you're sure to make some friends. Explore the mysterious establishment and don't lose your life and sanity. Uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, but be careful, as you are far from alone

name: Galaxian Fever
summary: A medal game released in Japan. Part of Namco's Shooting Medal series. Players used an attached gun to shoot coins at on-screen targets.

name: Galaxian Mini
summary: "Miniature" remake of Galaxian. Gameplay involves shooting down small formations of diving enemies.

name: Galaga Kai
summary: Mobile phone remake of Galaga exclusive to Japan. Features stages based on other Namco properties, such as Pac-Man, Xevious and Mappy.

name: Garten of Banban 2
summary: Continue the story of Banban’s Kindergarten. Delve deeper into the bizarre establishment where the place was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents, all while uncovering the truth behind the place…

name: Game & Watch-e Collection
summary:
Game & Watch-e is a series of e-Reader cards meant with ports and remake versions of Game & Watch games.

Each game in the Collection would receive three versions: a Classic Version (a "direct" port of the Game & Watch original), a Color Version (remakes similar to the ones in Game & Watch Gallery series) and a Collector Version.

In all, more than 25 games were planned, but due to the failure of the e-Reader in North America, the only card ever produced was Manhole-e: Classic Version.

name: Game, Game, Game, and again Game
summary: Game, game, game and again game is a digital poem, retro-game, an anti-design statement and a personal exploration of the artist's changing worldview lens. Much of the western world's cultural surroundings, belief systems, and design-scapes, create the built illusion of clean lines and definitive choice, cold narrow pathways of five colors, three body sizes and encapsulated philosophy. Within net/new media art the techno-filter extends these straight lines into exacting geometries and smooth bit rates, the personal as WYSIWYG buttons. This game/artwork, while forever attached to these belief/design systems, attempts to re-introduce the hand-drawn, the messy and illogical, the human and personal creation into the digital, via a retro-game style interface, Hovering above and attached to the poorly drawn aesthetic is a personal examination of how we/I continually switch and un-switch our dominant belief systems. Moving from levels themed for faith or real estate, for chemistry or capitalism, the user triggers corrected poetry, jittering creatures and death and deathless noises. In addition each level contains short videos from the artist's childhood, representing those brief young interactions which spark out eventual beliefs. Game, game, game and again game is less a game about scoring and skill, and more an awkward and disjointed atmospheric, the self built into a jumping, rolling meander of life.

name: Game of Skulls
summary:
In Game of Skulls you are playing against an AI, trying to predict its moves and come up with a counter strategy. The rules are simple but coming up with the right strategy is a serious challenge.
Both you and the AI start with 12 cards. In each round, you both play a card on different stacks collecting penalty points. Whoever has the least amount of penalty points at the end wins. You can play multiple rounds and keep track of your overall score.
The game has two difficulty modes. One mode for beginners that doesn't keep a persistent score and a challenge mode.

name: Garbage Truck City Tycoon
summary:
"Let’s clean the world together! Join EMKA - waste disposal company, on their quest to save our planet from getting covered in trash. Welcome to Garbage Truck City Tycoon. In this game you as a player take control of a recycling ECO truck, equipped with special vacuums that harvest garbage. By cleaning the environment you can invest in new trucks, upgrades and green technologies that will improve your gameplay. The main goal of this game is to highlight the importance of ecology. Various environments starting from forests, cities and deserts you will encounter in the game will show you how garbage crisis affects the environment. Features:
Buy and upgrade trucks, for better performance
Collect special boosters with various effects
Unlock legendary trucks
Construct and upgrade structures of garbage processing
Expand your business
Dozens of levels with various environments to unlock
Help us clean the world together with EMKA!"

name: Gallag
summary:
Remember the game, Galaga?
This game is not what it used to be
but try to keep the memory of classic games.
If you miss the nostalgia of the past, give it a try.
Simple control and intuitive interface, etc.
If you are first on it. You can get used to it easily,

name: Garden In
summary: Garden In! is a cozy and cute sandbox game about growing tiny and lovely plants. Just relax, take care of your seedlings, and watch your dream garden come to life while decorating your rooms and spaces.

name: Galacticraft
summary: Galacticraft is a mod that lets you travel to new planets with your own spaceship, explore dungeons, and build space stations with friends.

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
summary: Cancelled port of Vermin (the original version) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Vermin
summary: A cancelled port of Vermin (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Spitball Sparky
summary: A cancelled port of Spitball Sparky for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Octopus
summary: A cancelled port of Octopus for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Octopus
summary: A cancelled port of Octopus (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Fire
summary: A cancelled port of Fire for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Fire
summary: A cancelled port of Fire (the 1997 remake) for the e-Reader.

name: Game & Watch-e: Manhole
summary: A cancelled remake of Manhole meant to be released for the e-Reader. It was represented by a white Luigi on the package of the cancelled Game & Watch-e Collection. It was one of the games in the Collector Version.

name: Garden of Pets
summary: Experience the joy of caring for your own virtual pet in the beautiful world of Garden of Pets!

name: Galaxy Hero H2H
summary:
This retro space shooter lets you battle head to head to find out who is the greatest Galaxy Hero!
Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing!

name: Gaelco Championship Tuning Race
summary:
Gaelco Championship Tuning Race is a car track racing game where players race their cars around a circuit. There are several tracks to choose from, and players can tune their car to personalise them and enhance them.

There are two modes: Arcade Race, where the player will race against other cars (human or computer opponents) and Tournament Time Attack, where the player can race alone to score their best possible lap time. Players can choose from four different cars and four different racetracks. The four different circuits vary in difficulty and players can choose dry, variable and wet weather to race in for each of the tracks. Players accumulate points during their race and may use these points to buy accessories with which to tune their car.

name: Gaop
summary: Use the up, down, left and right buttons to control the player to push the box to the designated position to pass the level. If you want to restart the level, please long press Left Control. If you want to quit the game, please long press ESC.

name: Galaxian3
summary: A cancelled Virtual Boy port of Galaxian 3.

name: Gamehunt
summary: A game about buying a game.

name: Garbage Truck Simulator
summary: The compactor is hungry! 3D simulation game with authentic trucks and realtime destruction physics. Fill the compactor with garbage and keep pressing the button until everything has been smashed. Drive the truck from one stop to the next and collect every pile of garbage from the streets.

name: Garfield: Bound For Home
summary: Garfield: Bound for Home is an unreleased Garfield game for the Nintendo DS which was set to be released in late 2005.

name: Garfield Gets Real
summary: A cancelled Wii port for Garfield Gets Real. It was planned to be released on October 17th, 2008.

name: Garfield in TV Land
summary: Garfield in TV Land is an unreleased port of Garfield: Caught in the Act for the Sega 32X.

name: Garfield: The Lost Levels
summary:
Garfield: The Lost Levels is an expanded version of the Sega Genesis game Garfield: Caught in the Act. It was exclusive to Sega's "Sega Channel" service and was only available in the 1990s.

Currently the game is lost media due to it's limited release on the Sega Channel.

name: Garfield
summary: Garfield is an unfinished video game that was developed for the Atari 2600. The game was never officially released due to the videogame crash of 1983, which resulted in the cancellation of many other games that were being produced by Atari, including another Garfield title. It is based on the popular comic strip of the same name.

name: Gangster City: Mafia Car Driving
summary: Take your boss to certain areas safely in the mafia game. If you like challenging games, this mafia game is for you.

name: Gallery Manager
summary: "Gallery Manager" is a role-playing game with a high degree of freedom. You will play an administrator to run and manage the gallery.

name: Gangsta Bean
summary: Gangsta Bean hits the scene with his VEH-G Team, killin junk food and makin them scream. Gangsta Bean, Crazy Carrot, and ma boy T-Mato, they'll cut open ya gut and put in a potato.

name: Gachi: Space Orgasm
summary: Gachi: Space Orgasm is a third-person shooter with lots of weapons to choose from, hot scenes to unlock, weapon upgrades, and unique levels and boss battles. The dynamic controller adds an extra layer of excitement to the gameplay.

name: Gates of Everforge
summary: Gates of Everforge is a multiplayer action roguelike with co-op and PVP modes. Each match you'll choose a class, loot powerful gear sets, upgrade your abilities and unlock game changing perks. Fight for survival in co-op Horde PVE mode or face other teams in Raid PVP mode.

name: Gachi: Christmas Party
summary: Welcome to "Gachi: Christmas Party " a visual novel filled with hilarious and heartwarming moments set against the backdrop of a festive holiday party. Will you find love under the mistletoe or will you end up alone with only your eggnog for company? The choice is yours!

name: Gal Ramirez's Lion
summary: An action-adventure metroidvania.

name: Galaxy Kingdoms
summary: Galaxy Kingdoms is an action/adventure shooter. Control a bounty hunter exploring the galaxy in search of lucrative and dangerous bounties. Do profitable missions, upgrade your character, buy new weapons, explore planets in search of treasures and get more and more loot

name: GameDev Life Simulator
summary: In the Simulator of a game developer, you will be able to understand all the subtleties of this profession, understand how the game industry works and all the difficulties of one developer.

name: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR
summary: Gambling Paradise: The Escape Call VR is a puzzle game which takes place in the ocean's depths. You play as a penguin thief who must guide his teammate to escape from the casino with the loot.

name: Gain Ground
summary: 8-bit port of Gain Ground.

name: Galaxy Revo 2
summary: Play as a spaceship in space full of dangers. Your job is to dodge enemy spaceships and fuel up new opportunities for you. The game is great for relaxing.

name: Gal*Gun 2: Complete DLC Bundle
summary: Gal*Gun 2, the notoriously lewd rail-shooter is back! In case you already own the game itself, you can now complete your set by adding all the DLC you’re missing to your collection!

name: Gal*Gun 2: Complete Edition
summary: Gal*Gun 2, the notoriously lewd rail-shooter is back with the Complete Edition, which brings together all the existing DLC in one tidy package! As you bring girls euphoria and hoover off their skirts, you can now get all of their outfits in one go, as well as enjoy the game in VR for a more immersive experience!

name: Galactic Gladiators
summary: "Galactic Gladiators" is a 2D top-down shooter where you control a spaceship battling against enemy forces. Choose cards for unique abilities, collect crystals to upgrade, and defeat bosses to progress. Test your combat skills in this thrilling game.

name: Galaga
summary: Game Boy port of Galaga.

name: Galaxian
summary: Game Boy port of Galaxian.

name: Game Collecting Simulator
summary: In "Game Collecting Simulator", play as the new collector in town, Thomas. Interact with other game enthusiasts and hunt for the games you want. This is a short visual novel featuring casual gameplay.

name: Garten of Banban 3
summary: Embrace the horrors of Banban’s Kindergarten. Delve even deeper into the depths of the establishment that was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents and continue the search for your child…

name: Galactic Empire
summary: Galactic Empire is a 2D turn-based strategy game where you, as the Commander, decide the fate of the entire universe. Expand your planet, explore solar systems, play cards in cantinas, modify your ships and conquer more planets.

name: Game of Whores
summary: You play for the former manager of a brothel, the goal is to return to the business and at the same time to help the 3 main heroines of the game to achieve power and influence.​

name: Galactic Getaway
summary: Explore a cozy, uncharted planet and make it your own in this wholesome multiplayer life-sim! Befriend creatures to gather rare resources and build your dream home. Play fun minigames, farm crops, and craft decorations as you shape your perfect slice of galactic paradise!

name: GameKid
summary: The Notebook city princess has been kidnapped by the evil Scribble King and it's up to Androkid to save her with the help of the magical fairy. Watch out for Scribble Kings guards because they will make you sad if they catch you. Use confetti bombs to help you on your adventure. Collect all the gold coins to open up the magical door to proceed to the next level. 20 levels in all with some surprises along the way...

name: Galaxy Balls
summary: Galaxy Balls - the legendary game from the Nokia 2600 and many other models!

name: Gambari Minoriko: Onee-chan no Shiren
summary:
Action RPG starring the character "Minoriko Aki" from Touhou Project.
The game was produced using TonyuSystem2.

name: GA Geijutsuka Art Design Class: Slapstick Wonderland
summary:
Inside an airplane heading for Japan, Mari is clutching a sketchbook which once belonged to her grandma, who is now deceased. The sketches on it are what her grandma had drawn before she died, reminiscing about the days spent in Japan. To color the sketches: a promise Mari made with her grandma. What will be Japan like, the country the grandma so much loved? Feeling hopes and fears, Mari drifts off to sleep.

The place she is heading toward as a short-term international student is GA (Geijutsuka Art Design Class). What kind of story will unfold, casting Mari and the members of GA?

name: GameMaster
summary: Your goal is to explore the facility in order to obtain a keycode, which will allow you to escape! There are many strange and familiar faces that lay within this place, don't be shy.

name: Gangster Life: Criminal Untold , Cars, Theft, Police
summary: Gangster Life is the number one game on how to grow from a simple crook into a gangster. Who controls the whole city where you were born and where you will start doing your illegal work. Explore a large detailed city with realistic textures.

name: Gangnam City Deluxe
summary: Dancing in Gangnam city like a pro! Can't stop moving, earn coins, get money with your style! Like the old platform games, you will be running and jumping on buildings, and that's not all, you will be able to ride a bike, drive a car and also fly with your private plane!!!

name: GachaHell
summary:
In this breakneck, arcade-style, game, you'll take control of Flow, Macho, and Jade - three idols who were fired from their dream gig for being too... different. But don't count them out just yet - with your help, they'll fight to climb the ranks and become the ultimate 5-star idols!

Choose from three thrilling game modes as you strive to reach the top. But be warned: the competition is fierce and the stakes are high. You'll need to quickly feed weaker idol units to your own to level up and reach a coveted 5-star rating. But if you're not careful, you could end up as level fodder yourself!

The world of this fictional mobile gacha game is not for the faint of heart. It's a cutthroat place where only the highest star idols will survive. Do you have what it takes to lead Flow, Macho, and Jade to their dream in this GachaHell?

name: Gas Station Simulator: Air Strip
summary: Airstrip is a DLC for Gas Station Simulator. A story-driven dlc allowing you to build a small airstrip close to your gas station.

name: Game of Earth: Build Your City
summary:
Build & manage the virtual city of dreams or nightmares in Game of Earth - the fast-paced city sim management game.
As the president of Earth 2.0, you have ultimate control over what happens in your city. By listening to your advisors, making choices, funding projects and investing, you can turn your city into an eco-friendly paradise or a carbon polluted wasteland.

name: Galacticare
summary: Save the galaxy - one patient at a time! As the new director of Galacticare, you will build and manage a series of hospitals to keep your patients alive for as long as possible - for money! And also because it’s the right thing to do.

name: Gakuen Handsome Fighters
summary: Gakuen Handsome Fighters is a single-player 2D action game. The handsome boys fight using punches, kicks, and special moves.

name: Gambit Shifter
summary: A relaxing puzzle game inspired by chess. Master the board, change your form and create your path to dethrone the opponent King!

name: Game of Rollink
summary: Game of Rollink is a PvP card game with auto-battler, where you play as a medieval lord to outwit sinister opponents on the gaming table and seize the supreme throne. Bet wisely because gold and countless lives of loyal soldiers are at stake. Make your best hand and may the odds be in your favor.

name: Garden of Roses: Summerset
summary: A branching visual novel set in a world where monster girls walk among us. Take the role of Will Getz, a young man with a score to settle after 15 long years of being away from home. Unravel the mysteries and intrigue that have been awaiting your return, after all this time.

name: Gakken DS: Otona no Gakushuu Kintaichi Sensei no Nihongo Lesson
summary: Japanese language educational software with sections focusing on vocabulary, kanji, communication, cultural, and comprehension. Designed for adult learners for improving Japanese language mastery.

name: Gateway to English: Eigo de Go!
summary:
This game is designed to teach Japanese how to speak English through four different activities. Those activities include:

Typing on an English or Japanese Katakana tutor keyboard to learn words and the objects that pair with them.
Four different domestic locations with objects and their names dictated.
Four categories of puzzles that indicate objects and their relationships.
Four radios with their own topic, which show an object, the name in English and the name in Japanese.

name: Galaxy Feud
summary:
Battle against friends online in epic battles in space. Earn credits and XP and upgrade your 5 individual spaceships with amazingly powerful weapons.
Galaxy Feud is a game that can be played by anyone. Built on familiar game mechanics to bring you a unique gaming experience with an incredible amount of gaming styles available.

name: Game Dev Fantasy
summary: Join the adventure of game development while sailing the seas with your indie studio! Use your wits and strategy to complete development tasks, learn new skills, and launch your game before the deadline. With the sea breeze on your face, you're all set to create an amazing game!

name: Gain Foxes
summary: This game is a business simulation where you aim to achieve a target amount of money along with the merchant Finne. The business strategies are deployed by each player by combining five choices.

name: Gadget Tycoon
summary: Gadget Tycoon allows you to step into the shoes of an inventor and embark on a journey to become famous and take on the world with your inventions. Gadget Tycoon is a well-executed game that is fun, intricate, and goes beyond a standard tycoon game by including adventure and story portions

name: Garage Sale
summary: It's garage sale day! Embark on a small scavenger hunt throughout Lettuce Village's community-wide garage sale. In this story exploration game, you'll collect items with strange backstories, help your quirky neighbors, and maybe even uncover some of the town's secrets... Coming soon!

name: Galaga Micro Player
summary: Get ready to face-off­ against bug-like aliens again in this sequel to Galaxian. Galaga was first released in 1981 and is just as popular and beloved as its predecessor but kicks it up a notch with even more awesome space-tastic features.

name: Garden Weeder
summary: Carefully maneuver the mower to cut all of the grass without hitting the Bibarels (a character from Pokemon). Otis from the movie Barnyard appears in the bottom-left corner.

name: GalaxyMotoCrossHD
summary: Awesome motorbike game for iphone and iPad where you can compete with other players and friends through 34 different levels. Feel the adrenaline while making flips and riding lightening bikes and boost your speed by getting those extra power boosts. Are you ready for some bike racing?

name: Galactic Gluttony
summary: Agent Red has one job, to hide the existence of aliens. But when a UFO shows up and starts dropping their food everywhere, things start to get a little troublesome. The fastest way to get rid of all the food? Eating it, obviously.

name: Gate Zero
summary: Travel through time to ancient Israel in this compelling story-rich adventure. Explore a rich historical world as you engage with familiar events from the 1st century. Gather resources to help the locals, use stealth to avoid danger, and unlock riddles to unravel an age-old secret.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Supernova
summary: You are the leader of a space-faring civilization at the dawn of the 24th century whose choices for domination are endless: planetary conquest, cultural domination, political alliances, technological supremacy. Your mission is to spread your civilization across the known universe.

name: Galaxy Revo: Remake
summary: Destroy enemy spaceships and reach new incredible records with Galaxy Revo: Remake!

name: Gather
summary: Harvest crop, pick fruit, collect bales, chop down trees, plant seeds all while investigating and exploring a series of tiny islands along the way. Discover the secrets hidden in the lands while relaxing and solving mysterious puzzle of the land.

name: Gatekeeper: Infinity
summary: Prologue version of the game Gatekeeper. Gatekeeper: Infinity is a fast-paced rogue-lite shooter where you'll search for the stolen Heart of the Universe and battle machine enemies! Play solo or join forces with friends in co-op mode.

name: Gaia Trek
summary: In "Gaia Trek", you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Gateway
summary: Guide the character through a series of rooms. Solve a mini-puzzle within each room to advance.

name: Galeao's Dreams
summary:
Galeão's Dreams takes players on an exciting adventure through a series of dreamscapes, where they'll have to navigate various obstacles and defeat enemies to save the villagers of DreamsLand. As Galeão, players will face off against a range of enemies.

The game's retro-inspired graphics and music will transport players back to the golden age of platformers in the 80s and 90s. The visuals are rendered in 16-bits, giving the game a classic, pixelated look that pays homage to the NES games of old. The music is upbeat and catchy, with chiptune-style melodies that will keep players engaged and motivated as they progress through the levels.

Galeão's abilities are relatively simple, but players will need to master them to make it through the levels unscathed. He can jump to avoid obstacles and he can also turn into a Tornado when jumping to attack enemies. Players will need to time their attacks carefully to take down enemies without getting hit themselves.

The ultimate goal of Galeão's Dreams is to defeat Galeão's evil brother, Peter, and his henchmen, Galebot, the Slippers, and TokTok. Peter's motivation for attacking DreamsLand is simple: he wants to take over the world and plunge it into darkness. Galeão is the only one who can stop him, and he'll need to use all his skills and abilities to save the day.

name: Game ni Nattayo! Dokuro-chan: Kenkou Shindan Daisakusen
summary: Game ni Nattayo! Dokuro-chan: Kenkou Shindan Daisakusen is an adventure game for PlayStation 2, released on 2005. The game revolves around conversation, with various mini-games along the way. They play mini-games with cherry blossoms, and the results affect the girls' likeability. And once you've cleared the minigame, you can watch bonus CGs of the heroine you've chosen as your game partner.

name: Garten of Banban 4
summary: Explore the abandoned levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the residents of the establishment that was left suspiciously empty. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Gaslamp Cases 5: The Dreadful City
summary: Play the 5th part of the Match3 saga! Morgan, Jack, and Eleanor have solved numerous mystical casesin and out London, but their return to London greets them with terror. London is quarantined, caught in the grip of a mysterious illness, with no cure in sight - can they save thousands of lifes?

name: Game Of Puzzles: Dragons
summary: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: GateTail
summary: GateTail is a colorful action-adventure strategy RPG with a comedic story-rich basis and multiple endings based on your choices to boot! Explore an alternate dimension to your own in the search for a lost friend while avoiding its UNIQUE inhabitants and solving the mystery of your being!

name: Garden
summary: Garden is a casual mobile game in which players plant multiple types of plants that generate sounds. Each plant generates a different sound, and by planting various plants, players can compose their own musical garden. The project is a harmonious blend of visual art and music.

name: Galactic Conquest Battle Infinity
summary: In the year 3200. The Ethernal ore used as fuel for spaceships was beginning to run out, a galactic war broke out for control of the Ethernal, the galactic emperor Erick V issued a challenge to achieve peace, "the faction that can produce the most Ethernal will control the entire galaxy".

name: Galaxy War: The New Colony
summary:
Take more colonies to the victory of galaxy war. Take or lose them, it is your choice!
In the year 2123, explorers on the galaxy Jeus discovered the remains of an ancient spacefaring civilization. In the decades that followed, these mysterious artifacts revealed startling new technologies, enabling travel to the furthest start and to transform unimageable powerful weapons more than ever in entire human history. The basis for this incredible technology is a force that controlled the very fabric of space and time.
They called it the greatest discovery in human history. But... They didn’t even image Alian creature called ‘Alien Species’ which are gurdians of the civilization. They are coming to destroy ‘Human’ to protect their civilization. And more dangeorus creatures ‘Extraterrestrial’are waiting outer space!

name: Gathering Our Childhoods
summary: The story of the game is about the player traveling back to the childhood campus. Players are required to complete all kinds of tasks, so as to collect the memory points to be able to return to the original world. Let's have a childhood journey together!

name: Galactic Commandos
summary: Take control of three Galactic Commandos to infiltrate an alien spacecraft in this stealth-action game!

name: Game & Watch Oil Panic
summary: A port of Oil Panic for the Nintendo DSi.

name: Gal Pani X
summary: A Qix clone in vein of Gals' Panic, where one must draw lines in the screen to unveil images featuring fanart of characters from To Heart. Unlike Gals' Panic, the images are not sexually explicit, though some are suggestive. In addition, it features other additions to the Qix formula, such as the ability to move diagonally and bullet hell elements.

name: GameFutebol
summary: GameFutebol is a soccer game developed by Webcore Games and published by Globo, featuring the top 25 teams in Brazil and making them do penalties, dribbles, and much more.

name: Gadget Racers
summary: Gadget Racers is the first of two Choro-Q video games to be released on the Nintendo GameBoy Advance.

name: Galactic Glitch
summary: Galactic Glitch is a roguelike shooter, with Physics! Throw rocks, catch missiles, and rip apart your enemies - then use them as ammo! Craft your own builds from a large array of weapons and powers. Explore the far reaches of this simulated universe, become more powerful, and discover its secrets.

name: Garden of Pizzlerat
summary: Welcome to [Game Title], a terrifying indie horror/Puzzle game that will have you on the edge of your seat! You play as [Protagonist], who finds themselves trapped in a [Location] filled with danger and terror. Use your [Gimmick mechanic] to find your way out!

name: Ganku Ganku
summary: Search for the perfect fruit while evading your natural predators!

name: Gakuen Senki
summary: Hero is student council president and everyday he solves requests from students. With each new request he approaches the secret behind this school.

name: Galacdrive
summary:
Dodge asteroids, fight bosses, and use powerful abilities in Galacdrive!
Well, you did it. The enemy mothership is destroyed. But you only completed half of the mission. Not only do you need to take the deadly warp lane home, but you also need to fend off all the ships hunting your bounty. Will you make it home and what will you encounter along the way?

name: Gateway to Hell
summary: A isometric game where you must find the exit in a labyrinth castle.

name: Gavril
summary: A short horror VN that's more satirical than scary. Your goal is to survive an encounter with a home intruder with characteristics beyond your comprehension.

name: Gate of Souls
summary: I got a job as a night guard. They promise to pay a lot, but for my own safety I have to follow strange rules. As you progress, you'll have to find keys and open locked rooms. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the hospital and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight.

name: Garestia
summary: Garestia is an online multiplayer battle Game with Sexual Content and Nudity.

name: GanaBlade
summary: This is a hot barrage shooting game. Destroy enemy planes with powerful firepower, shuttle and evade in the barrage. Various scenes with rich colors Planets, Fire Stars, Jupiter Stars, Water Stars, and huge battleships. It's time to drive a space fighter and show your strength! !

name: Galactic Grinder
summary: Rider, skateboarder extraordinaire, is about to embark on a journey across the solar system after a catastrophic event sets him on a course to save us all.

name: Gate One
summary: Survive with your team as long as possible and discover different worlds with different loot.

name: Garfield Trivia Game
summary:
Garfield Trivia Game is a 1 - 2 player Garfield comic related trivia game for the Apple II.

Players can choose to play against the timer or another human opponent in their knowledge of the Garfield comic. There player can choose from 4 of 6 categories of questions for each game, and the player can choose to make their own data disk with custom questions. The player is given a random question from 1 of the 4 categories, and they have a short time frame to answer correctly, earning up to 150 points if answered immediately, but less if answering takes longer. The player loses 50 points for an incorrect answer. The winner is ultimately the player whom accumulates the most points.

name: Galaga
summary: Atari 7800 port of Galaga.

name: Garden Dreams
summary: Click around the garden to perform various jobs, like watering plants, picking produce and unleashing pesticides.

name: Galactic Catch
summary: Great for all ages! Play the latest out-of-this-world fishing game from Baobab Studios, 9x Emmy-winning creators of the fan-favorite, "Invasion!"

name: Galaxy Dwellers
summary:
Here it is! Absolutely incredible sci-fi strategy game from authors of Tower Dwellers!
Choose from 3 powerful armies, lead your unique units, fight in epic battles and CONQUER THE SPACE!

name: GasCraft
summary: This is a casual gasoline battle game where players need to control a small car to increase points by collecting gasoline on the map, while also paying attention to avoiding bombs chasing around.

name: Gangster Coin Pusher
summary: A gangster-themed spoof coin pushing game Unique strategy to push coins, control coin drops, activate your jackpot! Run a community and upgrade your weapons. Defeat bosses to win rewards

name: Galactic Defense: Automation
summary: "Galactic Defense: Automation" is a real-time strategy game that emphasizes unit behavior automation. All units run their own cycles: production, development, death, and recycling. Players design construction plans to defend and destroy enemies.

name: Galaxy Squad: Airplane Games
summary: Galaxy Squad: Airplane Games Tired of playing traditional arcade space shooting game? Let Galaxy Squad bring you a new space shooting experience! Alien swarms attack are approaching, and it is your mission to protect the entire galaxy at this moment. In order to protect the earth from being attacked by enemies, you must save the universe from vicious enemies.

name: Galaxiga Arcade Shooting Game
summary: Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is an arcade space shooting 80s game that makes you feel like you are playing a Galaga classic game on mobile. If you are a big fan of arcade retro shooter games like Galaxia, Galaxian, Galaga & Galactica with new modern shooting way and want to give freedom to galactic games, then Galaxiga: Classic Arcade Space Shooter is the perfect game for you.

name: Garbage Truck Driving Simulator
