summary: Collect all the garbage in the city with the garbage truck and enjoy the car game.

name: Gaia Survivors
summary: Control a variety of robots and destroy invaders from outer space in order to save the destroyed earth! "Gaia Survivors" is a 'Shoot 'Em Up' type sci-fi rogue-lite casual game with a retro-futuristic worldview.

name: Gachaga Champ
summary: Gachaga Champ is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 1999 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami. Two joysticks to compete in a wide variety of challenges. Players can take the challenge solo or go head to head with another player. Over 40 fun and addictive mini-games, it’s a great fun for both children and adults!

name: Gangnam Style
summary: Gangnam Style is an unlicensed game based on the song of the same name that is included on the Xiaoshenyou CY-828 handheld system.

name: Gainax Renzoku Satsujin Jiken: Ero
summary: Main character is a new editor who participates in Gainax new game planning meeting in the mountains. However, as soon as team gathers, storm breaks out cutting way back. Meanwhile, Gainax staff members start to get killed one after another. Can protagonist find a criminal and develop special relations with staff girls under these circumstances?

name: GalRock Girls
summary: Play as a cute yet violent warrior as you traverse new worlds trying grow your social circle while taking out the masses of dangerous enemies.

name: Gah!
summary: Fight through procedurally generated levels - from haunted dungeons to futuristic space stations. Choose from 13 unique characters, crush your enemies, gather loot, face deadly bosses, and return to a growing village hub where permanent upgrades await. The demons watch. The angels wait. You fight.

name: Galaxy Hordes
summary: Galaxy Hordes is an Action-Roguelike where you fight off waves of aliens across various unique planets. As you level up choose skills and passives to create a different build every run. Survive until the time is up and return to your ship with recourses to unlock permanent upgrades.

name: Game in Game in Game
summary: An escape room game fanatic finds themselves in an escape room of their own creation. Now, they have to find a way to escape their own bedroom!

name: GalaX
summary: A doujin shoot-em-up by MasaHG.

name: Galvanic Bride
summary: Feel the intenseness of stealth in the eerie great mansion of Frankenstein. Play Bride, Frankenstein’s creation, Perfect yet incomplete. Use electric interactions and skills to overcome challenges in your style. Think and struggle through the intertwining conspiracy, and resolve in your own ending.

name: Galactic Warship
summary: I always wanted to play a game where I could take direct control of a capital ship in 3D space. When I couldn't find that game, I decided to make it. As a solo developer I spent two years crafting Galactic Warship - letting you pilot massive capital warships in full 3D with complete 6-axis freedom.

name: Garbage Country
summary: Drive through a pixel art 3D wasteland. Explore vast procedural terrains dotted with hand-crafted landmarks, each holding echoes of a forgotten past.

name: Galactic Starforce
summary: Join the interstellar journey in "Galactic Starforce", a visual novel where you, the cadet, navigate a colorful crew in their quest to keep the cosmos sexy. Choose your alliances and find love amongst the stars!

name: Garganta
summary: 'Garganta' is a 3D Platformer influenced by Tsutomu Nihei's works. Embody Servo, an android racing to neutralise a device that'll engulf the Universe in innumerable singularities. Encounter peculiar characters and unveil secret plots designed by an AI, maddened by horrors it was never meant to witness.

name: Gassy Choose Your Own Adventure Weirdo
summary: you play some guy from the moon who farts a lot and his arch-rival is some guy just called Nerdy Guy who makes evil robots to conquer the world or something.

name: Gash
summary: Gash is a hack-and-slash roguelike game. You play as a ronin seeking to become the strongest swordsman in the Sengoku era of Japan. Battle legendary foes to take on your challenge to become the greatest!

name: GameDev Trash
summary: GameDevTrash is a highly unconventional game.Each level presents a new genre for you to experience: shooter, open-world RPG, horror,and much more! The game's plot revolves around the modern gaming industry and its peculiarities. All of this is mixed with a slightly insane storyline and trashy humor.

name: Gazolinas
summary: Gazolinas is a competitive arcade racing game. Master precision driving, customize classic cars, and compete globally across diverse tracks. Enjoy realistic physics and dynamic environments in this thrilling race to the top.

name: Gangstar: Miami Vindication 2D
summary:
Open world action/adventure game similar to Grand Theft Auto. The game follows a middle-aged man named Johnny Gainesville, who is in search for his brother, who was last seen in Miami.
This version of the game that has 2D graphics was made for java devices.

name: Gateway II
summary: The game has a very simple premise: guide the character through a series of rooms. Solve puzzles to advance.

name: Garten of Banban 5
summary: Enter Banban's Kindergarten, and you're sure to make some friends. Explore the mysterious establishment and don't lose your life and sanity. Uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, but be careful, as you are far from alone…

name: Garten of Banban 6
summary: Explore the forgotten levels of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the new terrors that reside below. Uncover the truth behind the place, and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Gauntler
summary: Avoid numerous dangers using the power of Mystical Gauntlets and make your way to the summit, braving increasingly harder challenges.

name: Gaia: A Protetora da Natureza
summary:
Get ready to go on an adventure and help Gaia protect Planet Earth, which is being invaded by aliens with the ability to blend into the soil of the region where they landed.

Use your water and wind equipment, cause erosions on the enemies, and thus prevent them from destroying nature.

name: Gangsta Bean 2
summary: Gangsta Bean returns, destroying junk food and nastiness where he finds it! More awesome adventures, skills, enemies and powerups. Booyah!

name: Galactic Defender
summary: Defend the galaxy from alien spaceships, destroy as many as you can before you are taken down. Achieve your high score and beat it again! What will your high score be?

name: Galaxy on Fire: Alliances
summary: Wormholes open. Conquerors appear. Planets fall. The Shroud Nebula is about to be seized and raided. And only YOU can stop it. Team up with longtime allies and old enemies alike to face the ruthless invaders, steal their rare treasures and build their superior carriers! Save the galaxy from the tyranny of the Voids!

name: Gates of the Mind
summary: Gates of the Mind - is a 2D Hardcore platformer. Game should search you in reaction and ingenuity in boss fights and locations.Each Boss fight and Location have a phases where you must be accurate in your actions and contains non-linear solutions for opening gates of mind.

name: Game & Watch-e: Helmet
summary: A cancelled port of Helmet for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: Game & Watch-e: Flagman
summary: A cancelled port of Flagman for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: Gas Station Tycoon
summary: Build a gas station from zero to become the best gas station business empire in the world!

name: Game Cafe Escape
summary: Game Cafe Escape is another room escape game from masasgames. This time you have to solve puzzles and escape from a beautifully designed game cafe.

name: Galactic Defenders
summary: Galactic Defenders is an exciting arcade game that puts players in control of a powerful spaceship on a mission to protect the galaxy from invading enemy spaceships. As a skilled pilot and defender of the cosmos, your objective is to obliterate the incoming waves of hostile ships while dodging their relentless attacks. The game features an intuitive control system that allows players to navigate their spaceship with precision, aiming and firing at the encroaching foes. With each successful takedown, players earn points that contribute to their score. As the game progresses, the intensity ramps up, presenting players with faster and more cunning adversaries. Prepare to engage in an adrenaline-pumping battle as you strive to achieve the highest score and secure your place as the ultimate Galactic Defender.

name: Gamma Labs
summary: An action packed episode 1 style map from the creator of CH Retro Episode.

name: Game-VCD 1
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 2
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 3
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 4
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 5
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 6
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 7
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 8
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Game-VCD 9
summary: Compilation disc officially licensed from Sega by Tianli.

name: Garlic Builder
summary: Garlic Builder is a unique building game. As the new builder of the Garlic Family, can you inherit your father's building hammer, take various orders, follow the blueprint, or use your imagination to fulfill the strange needs of your customers?

name: Gangstar: Crime City
summary: Gangstar: Crime City is an open-world action-adventure video game published by Gameloft and developed by at least one of its subsidiaries; it is the first installment in the Gangstar series, was released in October 2006 for button-operated mobile phones, and is set in Crime City.

name: Galactic Storm
summary: Galactic Storm is a chase-view shooter in the same vain as Galaxy Force or Taito's own Night Striker. The player controls a spaceship equipped with a shield to withstand multiple hits, in addition to the standard shot there is a also a more effective special weapon in limited supply available. After taking off, the player flies on a predetermined course with some limited maneuvering room through the stages, facing of against waves of enemies (giant robots for example). At the end of a level, a stronger boss enemy awaits. Once this obstacle has been defeated, the ship's shields get recovered to some extent and the player can continue the flight through various environments, including for example the wide-openness of space, planetscapes covered with trees, and narrow tunnels.

Duke is sent to Galbadia to investigate claims of a secret alien hive nearby, the purpose of which is believed to be using captured local babes to breed alien drones. Duke rents an apartment near the central park and takes a shit. Upon learning of Duke's presence, the hive Overlord commands his troops to seize the town as a means to protect the hive. Next thing you know, you've got Recon Cars circling the park while an alien breach squad is on its way to your apartment. Your task is to locate the hive and kill the Overlord.

name: Galaxian
summary: Galaxian is a 1979 fixed shooter arcade video game developed and published by Namco. The player assumes control of the Galaxip starfighter in its mission to protect Earth from waves of aliens. Gameplay involves destroying each formation of aliens, who dive down towards the player in an attempt to hit them.

name: Galaxian
summary: A Port for Atari 2600, Galaxian expanded on the formula pioneered by Space Invaders. As in the earlier game, Galaxian featured a horde of attacking aliens that exchanged shots with the player. In contrast to Space Invaders, Galaxian added an element of drama by having the aliens periodically make kamikaze-like dives at the player's ship, the Galaxip.

name: Gang Man
summary:
In Gang Man, you play a desperado on the run from the law after your latest villainous escapade. Rival armed gang members are hot on your trail, and it's a case of shoot or be shot. You control the motion of the getaway car as it speeds down a straight highway. The opposing cars have gang members leaning out of their windows to shoot at you either vertically or horizontally. You can also shoot back, and the direction of your shot will be opposite the one in which your car last moved. Once you have killed all your pursuing enemies, the level is complete.

The first level requires you to defeat only one opponent to complete the level. Subsequent levels add opponents and increases the frequency of their gun-shots. Multiple foes can appear on screen simultaneously, and defeating them before the timer runs out gives you bonus points. Additional points can be scored by collecting loot which randomly appears on the road as you drive by. If you are shot, you loss one of your three lives. Once you have used those up, it is game over.

name: Gaza SP

People who have lived there for more than a century are being evicted from their homes.
The invaders' pretext is that the land used to be theirs.
Every minute counts and the roar of the tractors gets closer and closer.
There is only one way to avoid the worst, and it won't be easy.

Welcome to Gaza - São Paulo.

Unlike traditional games, Gas Hero places a great emphasis on game theory, offering richer strategies for players and leveraging decentralized trading platforms to maximize the transparency of on-chain data. It also introduces a highly participatory governance experience, allowing more in-depth player involvement and engagement.

name: Galaxy Fräulein Yuna FX: Kanashimi no Siren
summary: The third game in the Galaxy Fräulein Yuna series, Kanashimi no Sirene picks up where the last game ended. After having successfully saved the Earth, Yuna and her new friend, the ever-hungry female android Yuri Cube, return to their normal high school life – or so they think. Because her old enemies will do anything to destroy her, including wrongly accusing her of world domination plans. This draws the attention of a highly ranked female intelligence officer of the Galaxy Alliance, who operated under codename “Sirene” and who pretends to be an exchange student in the Shiraokadai High School, while her true goal is to arrest Yuna… Kanashimi no Sirene plays similarly to the other games in the series, with the main gameplay consisting of being taken automatically to different screen and making dialogue choices. There are also turn-based battles, during which the player has to choose the right attacks at the right time to defeat the opponents. There are also a few mini-games that appear during the course of the game, such as a quiz show and a slot machine-type game with the purpose of getting new clothes for Yuna. There is an extensive “Extras” menu in the game, which features character album, graphical sketches, photos of various material connected to the series (such as magazines or covers of previous games) etc.

name: GalaxyWak
summary:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2023

name: Gauntlet
summary: This game has nothing to do with the Atari arcade game or any of the home-ported versions. You are the great explorer, Sir Robert Wittenbottom. You have discovered an ancient civilization deep within the forest of a mysterious island. Since you're a likable old fellow, they have decided to induct you into their council of warriors. But first you must prove your worthiness by running the gauntlet. You are given three glasses of water. You must run through the gauntlet to the ceremonial fires and use your water to put them out. You current glass of water will then be refilled then it is off to the next fire. Of course, it is not that easy. You must jump over rocks and logs, duck under stones, arrows and tomahawks, and avoid hitting trees or touching the sides of the gauntlet.You can ease the thirst of the old men you come across for points but it will cost you water. The game is over when you run out of your third glass of water. To jump, just press the fire button. To duck, pull back then press the fire button.

name: Galaxian
summary: A port of Galaxian for legacy cellphones.

name: GameChanger: Episode 1
summary: Take on the challenge to close the four Portals in this varied 2D-Action-Adventure with shoot 'em up elements! Explore the open Interworld, solve tricky puzzles in complex dungeons, shoot your way through the hordes of counter viruses and stop the dragon!

name: Gang Blast

Game Tester Quest is an old school RPG that lets the player play 3 separate games as a test subject.

These games will come out in the following order:

- Detective RPG
- Cyberpunk RPG

name: Game Grumps: The Video Game

name: Galaxian
summary: A port of Galaxian for the Sharp Zaurus PDA.

name: Galactic Gauntlet: The Ultimate Interstellar Challenge
summary:
In a post-apocalyptic world where Earth is on the brink of collapse, humanity's last hope lies in finding a new habitable planet. The remaining population resides in the last "green" city, a sanctuary shielded from the desolate wastelands that cover the rest of the planet.

To select the most skilled and resourceful individuals for a crucial space mission, the city's leaders organize an intense competition known as the "Galactic Gauntlet: The Ultimate Interstellar Challenge." This competition consists of a series of grueling obstacle courses designed to test the physical abilities, problem-solving skills, and mental fortitude of the participants.

As a promising candidate, you enter the Galactic Gauntlet, aiming to prove yourself worthy of joining the elite team of explorers who will embark on the interstellar journey to find a new home for humanity. The obstacle courses are not only physically demanding but also simulate the challenges and dangers that await in space, such as zero gravity zones, asteroid fields, and complex puzzles.

Throughout the competition, you'll face fierce rivals, uncover hidden secrets about the mission, and make critical choices that will determine your fate and the fate of humanity. Only the most skilled and resilient will earn a place on the space mission, where they will venture into the unknown to secure a future for mankind.

In this intense competition, players will navigate through treacherous obstacle courses, each designed to test their agility and quick-thinking. You'll need to dodge, jump, and strategize your way past various hazards that threaten to send you back to the last checkpoint you passed. Your ultimate goal? To ascend the leaderboards, outpace your rivals, and etch your name in the annals of the Galactic Gauntlet as the fastest, most cunning competitor in this ultimate interstellar challenge. With each run, you'll hone your skills, learn the nuances of each course, and strive for that flawless run that will secure your place among the stars.

The game's controls are designed to be intuitive and responsive, giving players a sense of agility and precision as they navigate the courses. You can run, sprint to gain speed, slide under obstacles, leap over gaps, and even master the art of wall scaling by deftly jumping back and forth between surfaces. These mechanics not only add depth to the gameplay but also allow for a wide range of movements that make each attempt at a course a thrilling and unique experience. Mastery of these controls is key to making swift progress, avoiding setbacks, and ultimately dominating the leaderboards with grace and style.

name: Gatcha Gear
summary: Gatcha Gear is a side scrolling platform game where players will face challenging levels while guiding our tiny robot through a series of portals, each leading to a new bizarre and colorful dimension. Immerse yourself in a strange world, challenges, and excitement!!!

name: Garden Harvest
summary:
It’s Spring and you have entered an amateur gardening competition with three of your best friends.

You each have received a small patch of land. Show us what you can do by having the largest harvest, and winning the competition!

name: Gangs of the street

name: Galaxy Trek

name: Galactico
summary: Embark on epic battles in GALACTICO, the exhilarating slap-em-up platformer! Throw down with friends in dynamic remote clashes or enjoy uproarious mayhem on a single screen. Can you be the sole winner in this cosmic arena?

name: Gardener
summary: In Gardener, every leaf matters. Unveil the potential of the next-gen virtual garden🥕. Plant and maintain accurately simulated gardens, made of your own procedurally generated plant species. Discover, grow and shape unlimited species. Become a Gardener of Tomorrow‍.

name: Gamma Protocol
summary: Survive waves of enemies on a hostile alien world and contend with random modifiers every 10 seconds. Find new weapons scattered across the map. Watch your stats and try to use the most optimal damage type. How many waves will you survive?

name: Gas Station Story
summary: A surreal slice-of-life about a mysterious computer virus and its effects on the city you live in. Navigate day-to-day decisions, fall in love with your coworker, and alienate your customers by being rude in this dystopian desert ring-‘em-up — featuring graphics created with a Game Boy Camera!

name: Gachi Defense
summary: Gachi Defense is an incredible combination of fantasy and gachimuchi in the genre of survival with elements of tower defense. Gas Station Simulator
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Having restored the garden to its original splendor, the time has come to have some guests over and show it off. The mansion has a spacious hall for everyone to gather but unfortunately, you've spent all of your time on the outside and the hall is in need of a similar makeover. The wallpaper is curling, the fireplace is broken, and heaps of old newspapers lie scattered about. It's time to roll up your sleeves yet again and turn the hall back into an inviting masterpiece.

Join Austin the butler as you scour the old mansion for new items to sell in this quirky blend of Hidden Object and Time Management gameplay. Invite neighbors to your rummage sale and comb the mansion rooms for items on their wanted list. The faster you serve them, the more money you are certain to make in order to repair the house and customize it to your liking.

name: Galaxy II
summary:
"Galaxy II has all the excitement of the most sophisticated arcade games. And, it features four unique phases of action in one full cycle of play. In "phase one", you must destroy a squadron of fighters that attack in two different patterns-a zigzag and a backward -forward motion. In "phase two", another squadron attacks, this time in a circular formation.

In "phase three", the enemy command ships are vulnerable but watch out for their barrage of missiles ! Knock out all three command ships and the scoreboard gives you a "GOOD" rating.

Now you are challenged to complete a difficult docking maneuver. Your earth ship launches a space shuttle and the countdown begins. The faster you succeed in docking, the more points you will score. And, if all 5 of your earth ships have not been eliminated, you may continue to play.

If you are very skillful, you can score up to 10,000 points. And, to add to the challenge and fun, there are four skill levels from which to choose. Before playing, read on for complete directions." - Epoch Manual

summary:
Galaxians is a clone of Galaxian. The player's goal is to destroy a matrix of enemy spaceships which is gradually descending on the screen. Single ships will sometimes leave the formation and bombard the player with multiple shots.

There's only a single scenario with a single type of spaceship. The process repeats itself when a squadron is completely eliminated, but the difficulty increases.

name: Galaxians: Remastered Edition
summary:
Originally launched in 1983 by Artic Computing, the fondly-remembered Galaxians pushed the boundaries of graphics and gameplay, showing gamers what the new breed of home microcomputers were capable of. A fast-paced, all-out action shoot ’em up, this retro classic is still gaining new fans four decades after its initial release.
This lovingly remastered version published by Pixel Games is highly faithful to the original, offering retro fans and casual gamers alike a chance to experience the same thrill as the first generation of players had back in the day. The game can be controlled via the on-screen touch zones that replicate the original keys, or by hooking up a compatible controller to your Android device.

summary: Feel the thrill of galactic racing! The most exhilarating grand prix of the spacefaring age is upon us, and the audience is waiting for you. Gear up and start your engines, for the Galaxy Rush is about to blast off!

name: Garden Apocalypse
summary: Following a catastrophic invasion by a swarm that has decimated civilization. The protagonist, a resilient country dweller living on the outskirts of urban areas, must use his exceptional horticultural skills to preserve and defend his gardens against relentless swarm attacks.

name: Gachi Feasting
summary: Gachi Feasting is a hardcore action puzzle game. You will have to connect wrestlers into chain using their arms and other naughty parts. Will you be able to withstand this gachi world of falling men and their mighty fists?

name: Galaxy Idle Clicker
summary: Embark on an interstellar journey with Galaxy Idle Clicker! Conquer galaxies, upgrade your spaceship, and face off against a myriad of enemy ships. With engaging minigames, powerful upgrades, GIC delivers an unparalleled idle space adventure. Join the cosmic conquest today and dominate the universe!

name: Game Studies
summary: A short browser-based game exploring the fundamental ideas behind "game studies", such as ludology, narratology and video games as ergodic literature.

name: Gas Gas Heli!
summary: The military's routine training flight has turned into a disaster, and now it's up to you to save the day!

name: Gaming Raiding
summary: Third-person shooter games

name: Galactic Gardener
summary: You have to find the power flowers which have been stolen and hidden in a cave.

name: Gal Metal: Encore Pack
summary:
Team up with new bandmates to blow away those pesky aliens in the "Gal Metal" Encore Pack!
This DLC adds five new story episodes, characters, and songs to the lighthearted world of "Gal Metal," as five newcomers join the hard-rocking school metal band K.M.G. (Kichijoji Metal Girls).
Players can swap out the original band members with these new characters for live performances.
Take on the unrelenting Octoids and keep the earth safe with your new friends!

name: Gallium
summary: Play as a cool-looking knight and slay the Dark Lord in the world of Gallium!

name: Galactic Economy
summary: Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy? Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

name: Galactic Rusherz
summary: A browser Shoot 'em up.

name: Garden Box
summary: A garden-themed puzzle game.

name: Garrulismo
summary: Garrulismo is a Doom II megawad created by Eye del Cul. It contains 32 maps and was first released on October 16, 2003. Its title is Spanish and can be loosely translated to "thuggery", and the mod's irreverent tone contains many references to popular Spanish media and pop culture, seen most prominently in its humorous story. The title screen features popular Spanish singer José Luis Cantero Rada and comedian Chiquito de la Calzada.

name: Gaijin Mario
summary: This hack represents the humble efforts of a foreigner to pay tribute to the Japanese hacks that thrilled and delighted him when he first took to romhacking. VIP and OTL; Kaizo and Kouhai; SUI and SIG--these and many others caught and held my imagination, and their influence is obvious in this hack (and I have tried to acknowledge my sources whenever possible). But, as always, the line between tribute and theft is a difficult one not to cross. It may be that the ghosts of old hacks and levels will resent the violence done to their mortal remnants. I am prepared for that.

name: Garage Mechanic Simulator 3D
summary: Are you ready to build your own business?

name: Game Empire Tycoon: Dealer Simulator
summary: From small shop to big empire—can you level up?

name: Galacard
summary: Play with cards, with your Game Boy... with aliens!

name: Garbage Girl Louise
summary: Garbage Girl Louise is an indie platformer about breaking down boxes, cleaning up streets, and taking names! Of course, this is done through bouncing on evil moles, magic trash cans, and cardboard boxes, all while tossing anything you can get your grubby trash girl hands on! Save trapped raccoons, meet weirdos around the city, and even race against your ex-girlfriend! Dingy streets! Bubble wrap! Magical eggs! Lesbians! Yeah, we have everything!

name: Galactic Guardian
summary:
From the developers at The Jumping Food Games comes an action-packed endless game that catapults you into the depths of space: "Galactic Guardian". In this colorful, neon-lit cosmos, you'll battle enemy spaceships, destroy asteroids and collect as many stars as you can!

Neon-colored space: Immerse yourself in a breathtaking, glowing galaxy that impresses with dynamic lighting effects and colorful design on every level.

Endless fun: Destroy enemy spaceships and asteroids in an endless game that never ends - only you decide how long you survive and how high your score will be!

name: Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimension
summary: A 3D Action platformer video game tie-in to the TV Show/LEGO Toyline of the same name. It was originally being developer for PS2 and Gamecube consoles in 2002 but never released, leaving only the GBA game in it's stead. It would eventually release for Windows PC in 2005 as a bargain title in the UK, usually bundled with other LEGO games at the time. It was later included in the 2007 "10 LEGO PC Games Collector's Box".

name: Gabenwood 3: 99 Hidden Yen
summary: New adventure in finding objects at the parallel universe. Gabenwood needs you! Journey to alternative Asia to find all anomalies and save the World from destruction.

name: Gates of Migad
summary: Gates of Migad is set in medieval Northern Europe. Through the protagonist's travel perspective, it presents a panoramic view of the Nordic culture and the times, explores the conflicts behind countless myths, and gives players a deep experience of "role-playing and immersion".

name: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark
summary: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is a 2D action adventure starring two new characters. Servants of the Dark takes the tight action players enjoyed in Gal Guardians: Demon Purge and vastly increases the exploration and collection elements, shifting genres completely to a full Metroidvania for an all-new experience.

name: Garbage Scow Captain
summary: Until recently you were an elite Star Fighter Pilot. On your last mission, everything that could go wrong did go wrong.

name: Garden of Witches
summary: Garden of Witches is a cute roguelike action game full of danger. Help the protagonist, Sil, as she tries to round up her unruly fellow witches and save the Garden.

name: Gary's Fortune Telling Tent
summary: get your fortune read by gary!

name: Gaiadon: Eternal Quest
summary: An idle/incremental RPG

name: Gaming Cafe Simulator
summary: Revive a closed-down gaming café and build it into the ultimate gaming hub! Manage rentals, sell gaming merch, and expand with PCs, consoles, and an in-house café to prepare and sell fresh food. Attract customers with unique gaming sections. Can you turn your dream café into a bustling success?

name: Game Developer Simulator
summary: In the Simulator of a game developer, you will be able to understand all the subtleties of this profession, understand how the game industry works and all the difficulties of a single developer.

name: Gakutensoku
summary: In the year of new 1940, the earth's population was replaced by androids created by man after the devastating effect of the nuclear war. androids made their own robot utopia, but under the glimmer of the cities, hides a dark secret Seigi Kazuichi was another police officer android doing his duty, capturing evildoers who dares destabilize the peace of the utopia, but one event would change his life forever and entangle him in a series of bizarre murder cases.

name: Galactic Caretaker
summary: A space civilisation management game. Play as a Galactic Caretaker, controlling the growth of developing civilisations. Ensure each society reaches their galactic exploration potential….but not before they are ready.

name: Galacard Platinum
summary: Welcome to the Platinum edition of the Planetary Galacard Tournament! In this competition, you’ll be able to play against Galacard aficionados from every corner of Planet Ack, and, above all, have fun!

name: Gabibbo Massacre
summary: Indie horror game made as a parody of the popular italian mascotte "Gabibbo".

name: Garfield+
summary: 'Garfield+' is a mod of the 2004 PC game 'Garfield' developed by YouTuber kkclue that overhauls and refurbishes the game for modern palettes and devices. Changes include modern controller support, improved graphics, quality-of-life tweaks, bug fixes, and the removal of Odie.

name: Gay Monopoly
summary: A recreation of the 1983 board game Gay Monopoly by The Parker Sister recreated within Tabletop Simulator.

name: Galaxians & Gloops
summary:
Galaxians & Gloops is a double game pack that contains:

Galaxians: Based on the arcade game, you control a craft at the bottom of the screen, moving left or right, blasting alien ships in formation above firing missiles at you. As you blast the aliens, some aliens will swoop down firing missiles as well. If you are hit by an alien or its missiles then you lose one of three lives. Before the game you have a number of options that can be selected and they are speed (0-9), firing rate (0-9) and how many swoop at one time (0-9).

Gloops: A Pac-Man clone that has you moving about a maze eating all the dots to clear the maze. As you eat the dots, Gloops move around the maze as well and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives. There are power-pills and if you eat one then you can eat the Gloops for a short time. Before the game you have two options that can be selected and they are speed (0-9) and a choice of ten mazes.

name: Games 1
summary:
Games 1 is a collection of six games and programs which contains:

Orbit: You control a ship orbiting a star and the further you are the slower you circle it. Also on screen is a piece of cargo orbiting the same star and you must adjust the speed of your craft by moving inwards and outwards to catch it.

Sniper: A man appears on the screen in one of ten positions and you must press one of the number keys 1 to 0 where you think he is on screen.

Meteors: You control a craft on the top of the screen and you must move left or right through a meteor storm that moves up the screen.

Life: A program that was devised by J. H. Conway in 1970 and allows you to see a pattern come to life and hopefully grow. You place cells on a 16 x 16 grid and when you are happy with your placements you can let it come to life. Three cells adjacent to each other produces a cell, two or three neighbours, the cells survive and one or more than three cells, the cells die.

Wolfpack: You control a ship on the top of the screen left or right, and you must drop a depth charge to hit a submarine below moving across the screen right to left. You only have one depth charge per sub and when the sub reaches the edge of the screen it has escaped.

Golf: You must hit a ball into a hole at a random distance by selecting the range from 35 to 75.

name: Game-Pac
summary:
Game-Pac is a compilation of two games and a dice rolling program.

Greed is a dice game played against an AI opponent. The objective is to get the highest score by rolling two dice and adding the result of each roll. The game is played in ten rounds and when the player chooses to stop the score is added to the one of previous rounds. Rolling the starting value a second time leads to a crap out and all points of the round will be lost.

Brain Teaser is a puzzle game similar to the board game Lights Out. The player is presented with the numbers 1 to 9 shown on a 3 by 3 grid. Numbers are either normal or inverse and the goal is to get an inverse 5 and all others as normal. The player can choose to flip any number but then also all adjacent numbers will be flipped.

Super Dice is a program that simulates dice rolls. The player can roll up to five six-sided dice or one four-, eight-, ten-, twelve- or twenty-sided die.

name: Game of Fate
summary: Immerse yourself in the first-person perspective, cross time and space, solve bizarre cases, save innocent victims, and catch a mysterious killer! You will solve murders, uphold justice, and also gain love. Are you ready? Play the "Game of Fate" that crosses time and space, life and death!

name: Garbage Driver Truck Simulator 2025
summary: Become the Ultimate Truck Driver: Conquer the City’s Cleanup

name: GatePass
summary: A 2D platformer game with strong puzzle elements. Escape the 100-level labyrinth and return home safely.

name: Garden Snap
summary: A relaxing game where you can remove alien plants to restore the forest. No quests or enemies, just relaxing. You can also change the weather if you prefer rain. Alternatively, you can also just walk around in nature in a peaceful forest.

name: Game About Jetpack Fly
summary: This game about jetpack fly. Two thrusters. Two control buttons.

name: Garten of Banban 0
summary: Explore the origins of the mysterious Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive the dark past of the establishment. Try to make some friends. Uncover the truth behind the place, and who you are

name: Gardenscapes
summary: Create the perfect garden! Comb the rooms of a gorgeous mansion for hidden items and restore a once stunning garden to its former glory. Choose from tons of garden accessories to customize the garden to your taste. Become part of the city’s community and compete in the “Best Garden” contest. No worries if you are a garden design novice - an amusing and witty butler, Austin, will always be of assistance. Become an outdoor décor pro in this cutting hedge game!

name: Gamit: The Skyward Voyage
summary:
An incredible voyage about the disheveled old man, Gamit, and his crusade to annihilate a sky-born nation.

Plucked from the crust of the earth, the elite of the world decided to break free from the surface. Leaving the surface drought with pollution and disarray. However, there is one, misguided-idiotic-unwashed man, ready to take them down.

Gamit plays as a top-down shooter, pick from 12 varied weapons before you pick a mission to take down. Fight varied enemies in different levels through-out 4 worlds. Tackle goals with a variety of options, fight bosses with varied patterns and counters, and help Gamit destroy the new sky nation.

name: Game Of Thrall'an
summary: Game of Thrall'an is an action RPG where players take on the role of a character named Thrall'an, embarking on a journey to the icy land of Alterrac, filled with enemies, to destroy the Ice Lord, Lookholar.

name: Gator Brigade
summary: A game by Oddfellows Software that was formerly know as "Broken Hearts Club - Blue Bird Blues". Not much is public about it and the developers are currently on hiatus so its development is currently up in the air.

name: Gangstalk
summary: GANGSTALK is a psychological horror game from the POV of your stalkers.

name: Gauntlet Legends
summary:
The first console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in September of 1999.

This game introduced an inventory system that allowed players to stock and activate items after they were obtained, with a few exceptions (Invulnerability and Anti-Death Halo). This is also the first Gauntlet game to feature Sumner's tower and his shop. Four-player co-op is supported, but only by making use of the Expansion Pak.

name: Gauntlet Legends
summary:
The second console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in March of 2000.

This version is often criticized for its extreme diversity from the original arcade version. Most of the levels have been down-sized, many objects features buggy physics, and lack of four-player cooperative play (omitting Multitap functionality) gave the port relatively bad ratings. The game retains the inventory system from the Nintendo 64 version, the two new realms, and extensive cheat codes.

name: Gauntlet Legends
summary:
The third and final console version of Gauntlet Legends, released in June of 2000.

This version is most notable for being a near-direct arcade port, as the only console port to feature the four original Realms from the arcade original. However, some of their levels were completely redone, a new physics engine was used, and some of the soundtracks were remixed.

Like the arcade version, there is no inventory. The player can only access the shop after completing a level. Special items are used on a time limit, which is slightly longer than the arcade version. The game is often criticized for not allowing players to buy food at the shop.

This port includes many features from Gauntlet: Dark Legacy, including its 8 new character classes. The Poisoned Fields area is included as the first level in the Castle Stronghold. The Mausoleum is also accessible from a secret passage in the Castle Courtyard.

name: Gabang: Ultimate
summary: GABANG: ULTIMATE is a roguelike deck-building game that builds your own deck with various classes and items. Defeat your enemies with a cute backpack and randomly placed items that help you!

name: Gallery: Coloring book & decor
summary: Gallery combines a coloring book and house design game with a rich story. Become a painting master, express yourself through a range of artworks!

name: Gakuin Makyo: High School Crisis
summary: A group of boys and girls is thrown out of their world by a sudden earthquake... finding themselves in a new realm—a demon realm filled with strange monsters. Their fight to return begins now.

name: Gamma Strain
summary: Gamma Strain is an intense third-person co-op horror shooter. Gear up, create unique builds and synergies, and battle terrifying creatures. Teamwork, tactics, and flawless execution are key to your survival.

name: Gambit Shifter: Surrealm
summary: Surrealm is a DLC for Gambit Shifter, providing a whole new set of levels that will challenge both your skill and creativity.

name: Gacha Resort
summary:
Hit the Beach in Gacha Resort!

The ultimate summer beach vacation app! Collect over 140 different anime characters, each with their own unique swimsuit! Earn shells and gems and try your luck to gacha rare 6-Star units! Play a variety of beach mini games such as volleyball, surfing, melon smash, and more! Assemble a team of your favorite characters and battle enemies in adventure mode!

Dress up and customize your units with the hottest bikinis and swimsuits! Train your characters to increase their level, attack, and HP! Visit the resort for some one-on-one time with your characters to increase their affection level and make them stronger!

Ready to relax on the beach? Check out the shop and purchase new swimsuits, bikinis, weapons, surfboards, beach balls, tubes, decorations, and more! Every summer has a story, start yours now at Gacha Resort!

name: Galaxy Legend
summary: Galaxy Legend is a space combat strategy game that has been waiting for a leader like yourself. Compete with thousands of players in a dynamic online battlefield and pursue the ultimate prize: victory!

name: Gates of Despair
summary: Gates of Despair is a captivating single-player survival horror game with multiple chapters. Experience randomized gameplay, creepy jumpscares and terrifying enemies. Uncover the captivating story through cutscenes and master a variety of challenges. Are you brave enough?

name: Gas Station Weed Simulator 2024
summary: An immersive, analog-style simulator wherein the player explores a gas station, tries different varieties of cannabis, and interacts with the environment.

name: Gandhi III
summary:
The city is in danger from a new class of scum, with the streets in chaos and threatened with a nuclear attack the police have their hands tied, now only one man can clean the trash, a one man wrecking crew, the atomic pacifier, in this summer comes the most action packed movie game sequel of the sequel... Gandhi III!

Inspired by Weird Al's skit "Gandhi II" from the movie "UHF". In no way we own the rights to the movie "UHF", this is only a free fan game inspired by a segment in the movie. This game was made for entertainment, parody and pastiche purposes, and is transformative in nature.

name: Games Advent Calendar 2024 Bundle
summary: More fun during the holiday season with two Advent Calendars full of games!

name: Galactic Loader
summary: Galactic Loader is an action-platformer about a space loader who is forgotten on a hostile alien planet which is abandoned by people. The game has various power-ups, big bosses and many monsters that the player needs to defeat. On his journey, the hero finds leftover equipment that provides new abilities for the player. Fight through hordes of alien, giant monsters and escape the planet!

name: Garten of Banban VR: Distorting Clay
summary: Experience Garten of Banban for the first time in Virtual Reality in this brand new story! Feel full world immersion as you interact with the environments and characters as you attempt to escape from the kindergarten.

name: Galaxy Life
summary:
The new owner of Galaxy Life, Phoenix Network, has decided not to revive Pocket Adventures. The main reasons for this were the fact that the game was too old (it could not be placed on Google Play anymore), and the fact that they were lacking the source code of the game. They plan a new mobile version, but it will be compatible with Flash, and thus will not be the same PA anymore. That's why this wiki will only get minimal updates, to keep the spirit of PA alive!

Explore the world of Galaxy Life, build a space colony, attack enemies, grab items and rule the universe. Galaxy Life is full of interesting planets and characters. You'd be surprised how big Galaxy Life is! In this free to play MMO strategy game that mixes traditional easy-to-play casual gameplay mechanics with touches of more traditional genres and features like tower defense, RTS, or several competitive PvP features in a persistent on-line Galaxy. You play together with others or your friends and take on evil, so gather your friends to fight evil in this Galaxy Life social game!

name: GameMaker 25th Anniversary
summary: Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary! A fun look at the process behind creating the world's greatest 2D Game Engine! Manage your development house, keep your employees happy, and squash bugs as they come up!

name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties - Odie's Photo Album Game
summary: Odie’s Photo Album Game presents altered sections of photos, and your task is to identify the original, unaltered versions.

name: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties - Garfield's Maze Game
summary: Find your way out of the maze.

name: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad
summary:
Enter the world of the HBO hit series, Game of Thrones.
Experience an open-world action RPG with an original story found only in Game of Thrones: Kingsroad!

name: Gap Monsters
summary: Mind-bending, Space-rending, and Completely Innocent Creature's Life-ending. In this negative-space puzzle game, you'll drag around holes, fall through walls, and bring myriads of miniature Monsters to madness.

name: Galactic Traffic Control
summary: Draw paths for ships to follow, avoid crashes , destroy enemies , and navigate cosmic obstacles to get high scores & unlock power-ups across 4 challenging game modes + 3 difficulties in this mixed-reality arcade game.

name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo
summary: Dominate the streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler. Inspired by classic cyberpunk anime and retro road combat games, fight rival gangs and claim the neon-lit highways as your own.

name: Galaxy Hassle
summary: Step into the shoes of Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, as they steer their way through Asteroid Fields and Monsters a-plenty, to arrest Dr. Jillkoy - A menace known for his deadly atrocities towards intergalactic citizens. Do you have what it takes to see him behind bars?

name: Gacha Addict Simulator
summary: A simulator game where you play as a gacha-addicted human of society. Go to work, earn money, survive, and do what you were meant to do as a human being - play all the gacha games in the world. Gacha pulls earn you collectibles that you can place in and decorate the space of your small apartment!

name: Game of Fate 2: A Century's Promise
summary: Transported back a century by fate, you find yourself in a legendary tale of vengeance. Amidst powerful enemies in a tumultuous era, your mission is to assist those around you. Experience this immersive epic from a first-person perspective—authentic, weighty, yet brimming with hope.

name: Gamba Simulator
summary: Become a Gamba(gambling addict) who is stuck in a city which is partially controlled by mafia. Mine, distribute bills, gamble and make money to escape the city.

name: Gamestonk Simulator: Gone Rogue
summary: Gamestonk is the first roguelite shop simulator. Manage the last videogame store in town, keep up with the latest releases, trade smuggled retros, select your modifiers strategically, hire workers, and deal with pesky shoplifters.*Disclaimer: game titles will crack you up!

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! Happy Days
summary:
Gakkou o Tsukurou!! Happy Days: Is the first game in the series to be released in the Playstation 2 console. This simulation titles makes you the principal of a school, placing you in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. You get to decide everything, including the creation of your campus and even the rules of your school. Communication with your students is also important to building a strong environment.

The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

The game features 6 different kind of school principals to choose one at the beginning of the game.

name: Galeid.
summary: In Galeid, players explore a dreamlike world where they fish, eat garbage, and work to save their surroundings. This RPG blends horror elements with distinctly cute visuals, creating an unconventional adventure through surreal landscapes and quirky activities.

name: Ganyang Setan Alas: The Game
summary: Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game is a single-player shooter set in a haunted Indonesian forest, where four students, armed with a range of weapons, must survive relentless zombie attacks and escape a cursed fate.

name: Garden of Wandering Souls
summary: Garden of Wandering Souls is a Tower Defense game with a roguelite twist, featuring two unique mechanics: path building and tower attack range patterns that resemble puzzles, with narrative and visuals inspired by Indonesia’s Borobudur Temple, the world's largest Buddhist temple.

name: Garuda Emblem
summary:
Garuda Emblem is a beat ‘em up game with a taste of RPG content, where you can roam freely in the game’s beautifully hand-drawn world, get immersed in the story, and be the good journalist you are.

Play as Garuda Emblem members, a journalistic student activity unit that uncovers the truth behind the shady part of UNION. As the story unfolds, you’ll encounter various figures that’ll help you along in the journey. You can also upgrade your characters with different skills and abilities using your accumulated experience by beating your enemies to pulp!

Got bored of the main story? Refresh yourself with various side quests and mini games you can discover around the game’s world! Who knows, there might be secrets lying right in front of you all along!

name: Garland Boy
summary: GARLAND FOR SALE! A game about a boy who earn his living by selling flower garlands to cars waiting in a traffic light at the intersection. Save enough money and follow his big dream. When the traffic light turns red, your job begins!

name: Gaia Aura
summary: Originally made for the "Vanity" community project but has now been released as a standalone map by Ar_e_en.

name: Gar-Type
summary:
GORESTAR, the living planet, is on a direct course for Earth.
It's time to debut our secret weapon duo:
Ace pilot Jon Starbuckle, and his prototype starfighter, Gar-Type D.
Your mission: save humanity! Defend the Earth from the alien invaders!

name: Galaga 3D Impact
summary: In Galaga 3D Impact, players control a starship from a first-person perspective throughout a series of levels, destroying formations of enemies and avoiding collision with their projectiles. The game was exclusive to Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions. It was designed around the gyro controls and 3D effects of the Nintendo 3DS

name: Galactic: The Xmas Edition
summary: A fabulous game written exclusively for this Christmas. From Santa and the software elves. Welcome to the world of magical castles weird creatures and hidden treasures. Welcome to the world of Rudolfph, the Santa. Welcome to Galactic X-Mas.

name: Gas Station Manager
summary: An ultimate 1-4 player Co-op Simulation game where you build and manage your gas station completely from scratch. Team up with your friends, provide exceptional service and grow your business! Collaboration (and some chaos!) is the key to success—fuel up, have your fun and rise to the top!

name: Galaxy Princess Zorana
summary: You are the Evil Emperor's only daughter, but can you claim the throne? Raise stats, make deals, appoint advisors, and scheme your way through the Imperial Election - unless an assassin gets you first. Rule the galaxy or die trying!

name: Gambol 2
summary: 'Mario never returned from his last venture and rumours of a quiz crazy lunatic echo throughout the land. It's up to his dear brother Luigi and his trusty friend Captain Toad to adventure out and find some answers.'

name: Game Room
summary: Keep your mind sharp with the world's most popular word, card, board and dice games in this hand-crafted collection. Challenge your puzzle solving logic, relive your childhood nostalgia, or wind down before bed.

name: Garten of Banban 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 6 + 7
summary: Experience the Garten of Banban series with this complete bundle, including Garten of Banban 1, 2, 3, 4, 6 & 7! Explore the facility and make new friends... If you dare.

name: Galactic Striker
summary: Galactic Striker is an action-packed top-down space shooter where you battle enemy fleets, upgrade your spaceship, and save the galaxy. Experience thrilling combat, epic boss fights, and retro-style graphics in this exciting space adventure.

name: Galactic Simulator
summary: Galactic Simulator is a clicker game based on the Fermi Paradox and the Great Filter theory. Players can simulate the evolution of celestial bodies and civilizations in the galaxy from an observer's perspective. The game supports multiplayer mode. Create a unique galaxy with friends!

name: Garfield Tetris
summary: Garfield is maybe one of the most funniest cats and we surely hope that is a reason strong enough to make you curious about all the games with Garfield that you can try on our site, because if you are looking for particular games, you have to know that we are trying our best to offer you the chance to find any game you are looking for here on our site and any character you are curious about, and of course of one the many characters is Garfield, the funny, lazy, orange cat that we all know. This is a tetris game, maybe most of you know how to play tetris. You just have to turn and position the pieces that are floating from the top of the game in a way to form complete lines, moment in which the lines will disappear and of course you get points for that. Good luck!

name: Gaia-ttack
summary:
Gaia has summoned four champions to rise up and destroy the pillaging Sky Pirates. A beat 'em up platformer for up to four players.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Game of Thrones: Legends
summary: Winter is Coming in Game of Thrones: Legends free match 3 puzzle RPG. Assemble your team of Champions with characters from Game of Thrones and House of the Dragon! Collect Lord Jon Snow, Mother of Dragons Daenerys Targaryen, Tyrion Lannister, Rhaenyra Targaryen and more. Lead them to battle as you travel Westeros, where dragon games, fantasy, and strategy collide. The fight against the Long Night begins now in this free puzzle RPG.

name: Gauntlet
summary: Gauntlet is a clone of Defender.

name: Garfield Food Truck
summary: Jon Arbuckle has decided to take his newfound passion for cooking in a new direction: a food truck to travel cross-country! He takes Garfield and Odie along in a quest to create the most delicious sandwiches, scrumptious lasagnas and the sweetest pies and lemonade, but they are not alone! Help your favorite cat sneak some yummy food for himself and meet your favorite Garfield characters as you go along: Liz, Arlene, Nermal, Squeak and much more are all here!

name: Gas Station Simulator: Drive-In Cinema
summary: Gas Station Simulator expands, as Route 66 calls for a drive-in cinema. You wouldn’t let such an opportunity slip through your fingers, would you? So, roll up your sleeves and get to work because time is the most valuable thing. Acquire some additional space, purchase much needed projector and screen, and invite your old as well as new clients to witness some of the best movies in the history of cinematography.

name: Gas Station Simulator and Party Time DLC Bundle
Galagi Shooter Ultimate Blast

name: Games Designer Samples
summary:
In 1985, the Darling brothers released a unique game creation utility for the Commodore 16 and Plus/4: Games Designer. At a time when programming knowledge was often a barrier, this tool filled a vital gap by giving young enthusiasts the chance to build their own games with little to no coding experience. It was a groundbreaking effort in bringing game development to a wider audience—especially kids who dreamed of creating their own digital worlds.

The original release included three example games, designed to showcase what could be achieved with the software: Space Desert, Creature Crawl, and Road Stunner. This collection brings those titles together once more—both as a tribute to early creativity and as a snapshot of an era when imagination was just beginning to merge with interactivity on home computers.
