summary: Turn traffic into profit.

name: Gallium
summary: A 3D platformer where you are being raced against the clock! Get the fastest time possible across all the elements in the Periodic Table of Elements while finding secrets! Keep a close eye for shortcuts though!

name: GameShop Simulator
summary: Run a GameShop set in the early 2000's. Manage your products for sale such as games, consoles, and accessories. Customize your store and your character to make it your own. Play solo or enjoy up to a 4 player co-op and run the store your way.

name: Gaung
summary: Experience the spine-chilling horror game where you explore the haunted depths of an ancient cave shrouded in mystery. As Rani, you will navigate cryptic puzzles, eerie spirits, and survive the supernatural to uncover dark secrets and escape with your life.

name: Games of the Monarch's Eye
summary: Steel, strategy, sabotage - or forbidden magic? How far will you go to defeat your greatest rival and win glory in the grandest tournament in the entire realm? A text-based adventure.

name: Garzey's Wing
summary: Videogame adaptation of the Garzey's Wing anime.

name: Galaxy Cocoa
summary: Action game character upgrade

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! 2
summary:
The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

In this sequel the game features new features like select the uniforms, new class, a lot new school boys and girls, and even enter inside the classroom to select the professor and tell him to teach the boys and girls and improve their stats.

name: Garten of Banban: Last Ticket to the Abyss
summary: Descend into the forgotten depths of Banban’s Kindergarten. Survive sinister horrors and unravel dark secrets hidden in every corner. Uncover the truth behind the facility and find the whereabouts of your missing child…

name: Gal, Geek and Summer
summary: A lonely honor student, an outgoing gal, and me... an ordinary guy.More than friends, less than lovers, it's time to leave our youth behind.

name: Games Advent Calendar 2025 Bundle
summary: Double the advent calendar fun with this awesome bundle!

name: Galactic Vault
summary: Build your weapon to its full potential in Galactic Vault, a fast-paced FPS roguelite. Discover endless upgrade combinations, craft diverse builds, and unleash devastating abilities. Get ready to infiltrate high-security vaults and recover lost tech.

name: Galacard: Ackian Archives
summary: A collection of retro-style card games featuring friendly aliens! Galacard: Ackian Archives features enhanced ports of three installments in the strategy-based Galacard card game series: Galacard, Galacard Platinum and Galacard Advance.

name: Game Settings
summary:
A journalist receives a mysterious package. A console. And a game. No combat, no score, no objectives, only movement, and a menu full of cryptic settings you’re meant to adjust.
What are you really configuring? The more the mystery unfolds the more you wonder who’s really in control.

name: Gake-ppuchi Reijou wa Mukiryoku Akuma de Otome wo Sutetai
summary:
The heroine, a young lady of a noble count's family, was panicking as she approached the age of marriage with no prospects in sight. To rebuild her family, which was on the verge of bankruptcy, she needed a wealthy partner. Yet, being very particular about looks, she insisted, "If I'm to marry, it must be the most handsome Christopher!" and couldn't bring herself to settle for anyone else.

However, her childhood friend Christopher, who was older and always smiling, never reacted to her advances. Frustrated, the heroine eventually hinted at marriage, only to receive a reply she hadn’t anticipated—

"I'm not fond of virgins. But you’re still one, right?"

A typical lady would have probably stormed off in outrage at such a remark, saying, "How rude!" Yet, the heroine's mind sparked in an unexpected direction.

"If I were to get rid of my virginity, would Christopher marry me!? And if I could get a few tips on lovemaking as well, I might become even more to his taste!"

Resolved, she didn’t ask a friend for help, nor did she hire a professional—instead, she earnestly summoned a demon.

After all, demons supposedly grant two wishes, and he seemed somewhat... experienced.

Thus begins the story of a slightly (?) eccentric desperate noble lady and an utterly unmotivated demon—a tale of painful, yet endearing days together.

name: Gatestriders
summary: The Kaijus has took over the galaxy, Join the Gatestriders to exterminate all of them.

name: Gallery of Night Order
summary: Climb to the top of the spire in 'Gallery of Night Order', a classic 2D action game focused on boss battles. Master a variety of actions like sword attacks, dodging, and parrying to defeat diverse bosses. Dive into mysterious painted worlds with charming pixel art characters.

name: Garden and a Goat
summary: Garden and a Goat is a single player, casual, animal collecting and gardening game. Your robot is introduced to a series of ecosystems in need. You'll clean up the environment, revive the plants, and entice the local wildlife to return, unlocking ever more animals and decorations along the way!

name: Game of Life Kuzushi
summary: Game of Life Kuzushi is a homebrew game for Game Boy, that mixes Conway's Game of Life, with a block breaker game.

name: Galactic Blasters BR: Artist's Faith
summary: It's a horizontally scrolling boss rush shooter game that takes place on Light Island, where a member of the H.D.E. finds a bunch of enemy spacecraft in the Northern Mountains.

name: Gangsters in Love
summary: 24/7 with Dangerous Gangsters?!

name: Gang Wars: Cards and Bullets
summary: Become an underworld mafia boss in fast, tactical card battles!

name: Gate Warfare
summary: "Gate Warfare" is a medieval fantasy roguelike tower defense game where players take on the role of a kingdom's hero. Fend off endless waves of demonic hordes, recruit companions, upgrade your skills, and defend the last bastion of hope—the great city of Belrak.

name: Galactic Panic
summary: A pretty stupid point-and-click adventure.

name: Galactic Guardian 1988
summary: Welcome to the past of the future. "Galactic Guardian 1988" takes you into a retro-inspired endless game in classic black and white arcade style. As a brave pilot, you face endless waves of asteroids - in a tribute to the golden era of arcades.

name: Galactic-A-Tactic: The Most Diplomatic Solution
summary: Galactic-a-Tactic: The Most Diplomatic Solution is a 3D isometric, casual fighting game, where intergalactic leaders from diverse planets clash in a galaxy spanning war. Battle across unique landscapes, with diverse characters and dynamic environments; brawl, and survive in this spectacle of chaos!

name: Galaxity: Korea
summary: Galaxity Korea created avatars based on major regions of Korea. It is a special playground where you can communicate with people from all over the world and play mini games. Do you want to meet new friends and play various games? We invite you to Galaxity Korea.

name: Ganja Quest RPG
summary: Following an epic smoke, a group of stoner friends (and their cat) are catapulted into another dimension, where the prohibitionist Empire and the pro-cannabis Resistance fight each other with no holds barred.

name: Gape Kape Escape
summary: We knew they would come to us one day. We had been observing the development of human technology for a long time. We feared this wild civilization. Now, You must reclaim the artifact they stole from us.

name: Gang of Frogs
summary: Sail through the galaxy as a fearless outlaw frog. Plunder loot, upgrade weapons, eat flies and fight through hordes of monstrous bugs in an intense 1-4 player co-op shooter.

name: Gangsta Style
summary: A first-person versus fighting shooter with voice controls!

name: Game Saloon Simulator
summary:
Build, expand, and manage your own entertainment saloon!
A relaxing and enjoyable simulation filled with billiards, darts, karaoke, foosball, table tennis, and classic arcade machines awaits you.
Serve your customers, improve your saloon, and don’t forget to enjoy the games yourself!

name: Gal*Gun Returns: Birthday Suit Edition
summary:
PQube's Birthday Suit edition included the following items:

- Gal*Gun Returns Exclusive Art Book / The Sexy Chronicles of Gal*Gun
- Official soundtrack set (3 CDs)
- 6 metal pins and a 10th anniversary medal
- 6 art cards of the game's CGs
- Pair of "safety goggles"
- Special reversible cover for Gal*Gun Returns Switch physical version

name: Garden of the Greek Goddesses: Aphrodite, Artemis & Athena Love Story.
summary:
Enter a divine garden where love blooms with Greek goddesses.
Will you win the hearts of Aphrodite, Artemis, and Athena?

name: Garden of the Greek Gods: Zeus, Poseidon & Hades Love Story
summary:
Enter a divine garden where passion ignites with Greek gods.
Will you conquer the hearts of Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades?

name: Ganbare Goemon: Yukihime Kyuushutsu Emaki
summary:
Ganbare Goemon: Yukihime Kyuushutsu Emaki is is a light-hearted action-adventure game for 1-2 players and the first game in the Ganbare Goemon series for the Super Famicom.

It was later released in the Western market as The Legend of the Mystical Ninja with several changes.

name: Galaxy Defense War
summary: 'Galaxy Defense War' is a roguelike tower defense game where you need to select suitable galactic principles from randomly dropped heroes and equipment to form a combat-ready team to resist alien invaders.

name: Galactic Police 1: Lost
summary: The BS9856 Space Base is not reporting for two days. What is happening there? This is what Natalia K., an officer of the Galactic Police, must find out. Help her discover what happened at the base and where its residents disappeared to.

name: Gatekeeper of the Yin Dynasty
summary: Gatekeeper of the Yin Dynasty is an independent game with a fantasy fairy tale theme, and the core gameplay focuses on "identifying fakes and identifying monsters". Every decision you make is not only about the safety of the people in the city, but also about the profound impact on the entire city

name: Gancho Bond
summary:
Collect the golden chalice in a cave in the desert.

You only have your trusted grappling hook to reach high places and use it to kill enemies and move the elements to combine them to create new elements.

name: Gauntletak
summary: Commercial version of Gauntlet.

name: Game Company Simulator: Back to 2000
summary: “Game Company Simulator: Back to 2000” is a game development company to establish a management game. Employ employees, balance pressure and output, develop new game types, produce highly praised games, release and earn.

name: Gazar
summary: GAZAR is an intense vertical arcade space shooter where you fight against an alien fleet destroying the galaxy. Battle through Story Mode or test your skills in Infinity Mode with 5 difficulty levels and leaderboards. GAZAR delivers non-stop action, stunning visual effects, and dynamic combat.

name: Galactic Space Guard
summary: Galactic Space Guard is a turn-based tactics game. Lead your squad of elite soldiers against feral alien beasts and defend humanity’s space stations. Upgrade your squad, prepare for battle, and restore peace to the galaxy!

name: Galaxy for Dummies
summary: A chaotic roguelike auto-battler set in a ridiculous sci-fi universe. Assemble bizarre alien teams, exploit crazy synergies, and fight your way through the galaxy with humor and strategy.

name: Gachanimals
summary: A cozy gacha shop simulator set in a world of adorable, collectible-loving dogs. Run your very own gachapon store in an animal-filled town. Decorate your shelves, restock your capsule machines, and watch as curious customers wander in to see what surprises await inside each toy capsule.

name: Gaia Maker
summary: Gaia Maker is a planet-wide simulation game of terraforming, based on real physics and geology. As the planet's overseer, wield advanced technologies to reshape barren planets into life-filled worlds. Foster animal life, cultivate civilizations, or destroy them. Their fate is in your hands.

name: Galactic Deck Clash
summary: A deck-building roguelike set in a sci-fi galaxy. Collect a huge variety of cards, command different factions, and explore endless combinations. Uniquely, you can modify card effects and enhance yourself with equipment, runes, and items to overcome powerful enemies repeatedly.

name: Game Giant
summary: Become the biggest game publisher! Find developers, negotiate contract and market the games. Grow your company and design your offices.

name: Gaya: The Mystery
summary: A Korean-style Soulslike RPG set in the ancient Gaya era. A mysterious adventure of a warrior’s desperate journey to save the kingdom!

name: Galactic Tycoons
summary:
Galactic Tycoons is a free multiplayer browser game where you command your own industrial empire.

Build bases across the galaxy, master complex production chains, and compete in a persistent, player-driven economy. Specialize, trade, and cooperate with other players to transform a single outpost into a thriving galactic enterprise.

name: Game of Dice
summary: Roll the dice, rule your fate! Thrilling real-time board battles!

name: Games8x8
summary: For games in one app: Chess, Suva, Oxoxo (Gomoku), International draughts.

name: Gallery of Shadows: Lycans Returns
summary: Gallery of Shadows: Lycans Returns is a Hunting and Stealth game where you must hunt humans to instill fear and recover the lost Territories of the Werewolves or "Lycans".

name: Garbage Collector
summary: The city is full of trash… but what secrets lie hidden among the garbage? Hit the streets at sunrise, collect waste, and uncover the city’s forgotten mysteries! Upgrade your tools over time, collect faster, and progress on your trash-collecting journey!

name: Game Title
summary: A fast paced, pixelart 2D metroidvania made in Godot.

name: Gailardia: Legend of the Demon King
summary: Gailardia is an RPG for mobile devices. It's the first title in the Gailardia series and can be played as part of the Gailardia Trilogy.

name: Gailardia 2: The One That Survived
summary: Gailardia 2 is the second game in the Gailardia series. In can be played as part of the Gailardia Trilogy after watching an advertisement.

name: Gailardia 3: Eternal Peace
summary: Gailardia 3 is the third game in the Gailardia series. It is playable as part of the Gailardia Trilogy.

name: Gailardia Trilogy
summary: Gailardia Trilogy is an app including Gailardia 1, 2 and 3. The first game can be played for free, while the 2 sequels require watching an advertisement.

name: Gate2up
summary: This is a simple idle clicker game. Grow your item collection using points and strive to reach the ultimate goal of 99,999,999 points!

name: Garnet Arena: Mages of Magicary
summary: "The Most Beautiful Battle in the World." Thus is described the conflict that lies at the heart of this new original action game developed for the home entertainment market. Players will be able to enjoy the elegance and beauty that accompanies the flashy multiplayer battles set in the world in which mages of sun and rain dwell—Noir.

name: Ganso Family Mahjong
summary:
Ganso Family Mahjong is a mahjong game is which the player is a gambler (male or female one, since the game allows the player to choose a name, genre, blood type, etc) that in the new story mode he goes through some kind of board in which he advance playing mahjong matches againts computer opponents.

The game also features a tournament mode, a free game mode and also a complete tutorial.

name: Galactic Gardener
summary: A fast, wave-based roguelite where you grow weapon upgrades instead of wielding them. Plant, link, and defend your drone garden against alien infestations.

name: Garou Sliding Simulator
summary: Garou Sliding Simulator is a fan-made, informal game inspired by the humorously animated scene of Garou sliding in the One-Punch Man anime. Players control Garou as he slides across the terrain, aiming to travel as far as possible while avoiding various obstacles. The game is simple, comedic, and focused entirely on the sliding mechanic that became a meme among fans.

name: Galatico
summary: Fight your way through the mega-corporation Galatico, the gatekeepers of the universe’s most powerful transportation devices. Destroy their infrastructure and blast your way to the top in this boomer shooter inspired FPS.

name: Gabriel’s Worlds: The Sokoban Adventure
summary:
Gabriel finally took a vacation, but his adventure is just beginning!
During his travels, he discovered that mysterious villains have trapped helpless kittens inside boxes! Now, it's up to him to solve challenging puzzles to set them free.

Get ready for a journey full of color, charm, and fun!
Take on 40 Sokoban-style puzzles and help Gabriel rescue all the kittens in this relaxing and delightful adventure.

name: Garbage Classification Simulator
summary: Garbage Classification Simulator, is a simulation game that contains RPG elements. In this game, you can experience Garbage Classification differently.The game has a rich character skill system, realistic physical simulation.

name: Gaionin War Don't Combine
summary: This game is a new online FPS with a unique rule called “Shop And War.” The objective is to compete for points. There are shops on the battlefield, and players can also participate as merchants of death. Players who become merchants earn more points than those who kill on the battlefield.

name: Garten of Banban Bundle: 0 + 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 6 + 7 + 8
summary: Experience the Garten of Banban series with this complete bundle, including Garten of Banban 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7 & 8! Explore the facility and make new friends... If you dare.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Tales of the Terran Alliance
summary: Expand the Human experience in Galactic Civilizations IV with new technologies, events, and tools that deepen the story of humanity's rise among the stars.

name: Garden Gnome Beatmaker
summary: Gnome survivor meets musical roguelike. Compose your killer track. Hit play and watch the frogs burn. Buy samples and trinkets from the shop & repeat.

name: Gap Year
summary: Gap Year is a story-focused point & click adventure played through comic book panels that reconfigure as you explore Vera Novak’s one-bedroom apartment. Vera is a bright young scientist, but the arrival of an unexpected guest and a strange fixation with a cosmonaut may derail her academic pursuits.

name: Gate Guard Simulator
summary: Step into the boots of the castle guard. Inspect seals, expose smugglers and reveal witches. You decide who enters and who’s turned away. Will you uphold the law, or break it for your own gain?

name: Galactic Express
summary: A casual sci-fi puzzle game where you pack interplanetary cargo into futuristic spaceships.

name: Galactix
summary: Pilot your way through the relentless Xidus Fleet in an attempt to save the earth from annihilation. Galactix is a space arcade type game where you pilot your ship to shoot enemy fighters and collect bonus's with your ships mechanical arm. Galactix also includes a new Enhanced Mode to play.

name: Galaxy
summary: An arcade game where the player controls a spaceship and defends against waves of enemy invaders. The goal is to survive as long as possible, achieve the highest score, and progress through increasingly difficult levels.

name: Game Shop Simulator
summary: A store simulator game where you manage your own game shop by buying and selling console games. Manage inventory, meet customer needs, and expand your shop. Playable in single-player or multiplayer mode.

name: Gauntlet
summary: Working as a common grunt for CannoSec, you have been chosen by the owner to be a candidate as a distinguished Elite. A position thousands in CannoSec work hard to attain. However, you have to show CannoSec that you are a worthy candidate through the Certification Run. Are you meant for this?

name: Gang of Dragon
summary: A new action-adventure game from game creator Toshihiro Nagoshi, set in the streets of Shinjuku, Tokyo. Starring Ma Dong-seok as Shin Ji-seong, the story unfolds with heated and intense human drama across Shinjuku, including Kabukicho — one of Japan’s largest entertainment districts.

name: Gaussian Mansion
summary: Explore a cursed hotel in this FREE rail shooter. Face off against hordes of ghosts, uncover hidden secrets, and fight for the best time in this 10-15 minute experience.

name: Game of Fate 3
summary:
“Game of Fate 3: Clash of Crowns" is a fully immersive live-action interactive thriller where you experience an extraordinary life through a first-person lens.

Fate is a game—a chessboard of destiny.

On this board, there are no accidents.
Only victory... or defeat.

The winner claims the crown.
The loser fades to dust.

name: Garfield: Caught in the Act - Lost Levels
Garten of Banban VR
summary: Enter Banban's Kindergarten NOW in VR, and you're sure to make some friends. Explore the mysterious establishment and don't lose your life and sanity. Uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, but be careful, as you are far from alone…

name: Gary Goat RPG! Legend of the Jewel Seeds
summary: Join Gary and his friends on an adventure to return the legendary Jewel Seeds to the Inner Garden! A colorful, turn-based RPG inspired by Super Mario RPG and the SNES era. Use timed-attacks & magic to take out enemies while navigating isometric style platforming to discover secrets!

name: Game Company Simulator
summary: A weary ex‑developer, tired of pay‑to‑win and toxic workplaces, creates a simulation where you play as a game company boss. Recruit staff, push their potential, battle rivals, and aim to dominate the market with blockbuster hits to reach the pinnacle of success.

name: Garden of the Atom
summary: Garden of the Atom is a combat-focused Metroidvania where you hold nothing back. Start with every movement ability unlocked and play as 'Prodigy,' an exiled genius infiltrating a futuristic dictatorship to stop a tyrant from harnessing a cataclysmic meteor shower.

name: GameShop Tycoon
summary: Run your own game shop. Buy, sell, and grow your game business.

name: Gargantua
summary: Build your spaceship-city Gargantua. Forge industries, bend the free market, trade between planets, and defend your growing wealth. Every bullet is bought or produced in a simulated economy where a single mistake can shatter supply chains and trigger interstellar crises. In Gargantua, war is money.

name: Gaia
summary: An incremental game with non-standard counting about creating life. Because there's nothing special about base 10.

name: Galaxy Cleaners: Dracula's Castle
summary: Galaxy Cleaners is a physics puzzle game where you have to collect, clean, and organize different enviroments and deal with the many weird requests of your demaing client... Dracula. From all possibilities of time and space, you ended up in Dracula's Castle!

name: Gambit Maestro
summary: Gambit Maestro is a 3D tactical roguelite inspired by the strategic depth of the chessboard, infused with atmospheric mystery and narrative twists.

name: Galleria
summary: A compact art gallery simulator that runs quietly on your desktop while you work or study. Perfect for quick breaks, you'll hire artists, create paintings, and grow your gallery business without disturbing your workflow. Ideal for office workers and students.

name: Galaxyz Neo
summary: Simple controls! Deploy your alien allies in response to enemy advances. Issue commands in real time and protect the protagonist from waves of incoming enemies! Defeat all enemies to clear the stage!

name: Gas Ratio
summary: Are you ready to test your driving skills and your luck? Gas Ratio brings back the nostalgia of classic top-down arcade racers with a chaotic twist. In this game, speed isn't the only thing that matters—survival does.

name: Gacha Capsule Shop Simulator
summary: Stock and manage your Gacha Capsule Machines in this shop simulator. Help your collectors chase rare pulls, welcome anime lovers, and turn Akihabara into a true gacha paradise. Build your own capsule figure collection aswell, from giant mecha robots and kawaii cat maids to iconic meme figures.

name: Galactic Overthrow
summary: Conquer the galaxy in this streamlined space conquest and empire management game. With the heart of a classic 4x experience, but with campaigns that can be finished in one short sitting. Play any way you want: Open ended sandbox, race against bots, multiplayer vs friends, and more.

name: Gargoyle Garden
summary: Sit back, relax, and grow many magical and mystical plants in your very own greenhouse! Collect rare plants, upgrade your tools, and earn enough money to unlock new greenhouses.

name: Garden Gingdom
summary: Garden Gingdom is a single-player, fantasy, resource management game where you brew potions, craft magical items, and serve them in time to your customers in a fast-paced environment.

name: Garfield Kart 2: All You Can Drift - Garfing Cosmeowtics
summary: Get ready to make a splash on the track with Garfing Cosmeowtics! Customize your style with 3 new hats and a rainbow of 8 colors for your vehicle.
